projects.title: Bodiam Castle
projects.description: Ever wondered what the famous Bodiam Castle looked like during its prime? Visit this true to life recreation of the British bastion of defense against the French during the Hundred Years' War. Built in 1385 by Sir Edward Dalyngrigge, it's now ready to be explored!

projects.title: Billionaire Cliffside Mansion
projects.description:
A luxurious mansion for the billionaires who wish to have a majestic view! Play survival in luxury like never before!

- Drive your exclusive sport car!
- Massive modern mansion!
- Beautiful cliffside view!

And much more!

projects.title: Arabian Palm Island
projects.description:
Arabia, a mysterious place! Their people; great poets, architects, merchants and warriors! By a stroke of luck, this is where you’ve ended up. In your tent you sit, with what little you own! Time to venture out? 
-A paradise island, all for you to explore!
-A great city to find 
-Dungeons and dangers await.
-Be careful of the dead!

projects.title: Masked Bunnies
projects.description: Masked Bunnies have hopped into Minecraft!\r\nDress up in dark, light, or colorful bunny masks and impress your friends!

projects.title: Shoot 'n' Score
projects.description:
Shoot 'n' Score is a frantic arcade minigame where you ride railroads at top speed while shooting targets non-stop. Sharpen your senses and take aim, beating the max score is the real challenge!
- Custom target system
- Power-ups, bonuses, special skills and more
- 10 levels set in amazing environments
- Hundreds of targets per level. No time to blink!

projects.title: Realistic Skyblock
projects.description:
Explore the skies and journey through diverse flying islands and biomes. Conquer the challenges of making your way to your final destination, the End Island! 

- 8 different Islands. 
- A fun Skyblock adventure for a chill time!

projects.title: Area 51: Rescue Mission
projects.description:
Aliens have crash-landed on Earth and they need YOUR help to escape the shady government's cover-ups and control.
It won't be easy though... Can you sneak into a military base, hijack a helicopter, glide from the mountain, and rescue the aliens against the odds?

-Follow the story through challenges on an epic adventure!
-Custom mobs, music, textures, and voice-over!

projects.title: Copper Mobs
projects.description:
Copper Mobs have marched their way into your world!
Camouflage and have fun with your friends with various metallic mobs!

+ 12 Copper Mobs skins
+ 1 free skin
+ Includes oxidized and deoxidized Copper Mobs skins

projects.title: Safest House Ever
projects.description:
Are you tired of those pesky monsters? Or perhaps, getting blown up by those creepers?
Fear no more! In the safest house ever, you have ultimate defenses in your disposal!

- Custom made turrets!
- Luxurious base to explore!
- Live in comfort!

And much more!

projects.title: Ruby Port
projects.description:
Once upon a time Ruby Port was a peaceful and thriving port town with a beautiful ruby mine at the heart of its island. 
One day, the miners stumbled upon a cave where an ancient dormant dragon was awoken. The terrible dragon took over the island and left no-one but hollows.

Are you ready to explore the abandoned town of Ruby Port?

projects.title: Cute VS Cursed
projects.description:
Choose your side, cute or cursed! With all these skins to choose from you're free to decide between spooky or sparkly, scary or snuggly! Cute by day or cursed by night!

- 12 Unique skins
- Keep your friends guessing!
- Perfect for Halloween roleplay

projects.title: KVASIR, Nordic Village Spawn
projects.description:
Amidst the everlasting snow, a vigorous town shelters live-risking travelers wandering the North: KVASIR!

- Traverse a bone-chilling frozen cave, explore the ice-stuck viking boat or enter the sumptuous castle
- Nordic architecture set in a huge ice spikes biome
- Fight enemies & get loot to quick-start your adventure in the world

projects.title: Pyramidion
projects.description:
The mazy corridors of this accursed pyramid will wither the idea of ever seeing the sun again; atop, light is blocked by the keystone: the pyramidion.

- Full-fledged adventure map
- 16 secret hints showing the final crypt location
- Challenging puzzles, traps, obstacles and more!
- Choose your fate! Your actions affect the game!

projects.title: Weapons Alive!
projects.description:
Weapons have come alive with arms, legs, and loads of expressions to choose from!
Grab this Weapons Alive pack and laugh and meme with your friends!

+ 17 Weapons Alive skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes diamond sword, golden pickaxe, and iron shovel skins!

projects.title: Millionaire Tropical Vacation
projects.description:
Travel to your dream's vacation getaway! Explore the endless outdoor activities or relax in your own private gazebo!

- 3 Millionaire supercars!
- Luxurious and majestic tropical island!
- Private outdoor activities!
- Tropical vacation getaway!

And much more!

projects.title: Goldwagon Canyon
projects.description:
The gold rush is back! Recent mining explorations have detected huge gold veins in a remote canyon. Explore the area and find the best mines around!
- Discover a world inspired by the western gold rush era!
- Find gold and valuable loot in the maze-y mines.
- Enjoy an immersive survival spawn experience.
- Gather your own mining team! Multiplayer ready!

projects.title: Extreme Survival Mountains
projects.description:
Your journey starts on top of a colossal mountain!
Explore the mountain and its deep caves to find loot to survive!


+ Massive explorable mountainous environment!
+ Vast caverns and dungeons!
+ Multiple hidden chests with loot!
+ And more!

projects.title: Fashion of Spring!
projects.description:
Buzz buzz! Spring is in the air and outfits are changing! Choose your style and start the season off right!

- 7 colourful skins!
- Various styles!
- Everyday fashion!

projects.title: Rat City
projects.description:
Ever wonder what goes on in the sewers? A city made for rats of course! This kingdom of rust and rodents is a haven for merchants and players alike; take the throne of the ancient rat king for yourself and rule over the underground!

-Rule over a new explorable city
-Trade with a kingdom of villagers
-Discover the caves and wonders around the city

projects.title: Modern Colorful City
projects.description:
A modern city with mountains, large buildings, bike trails, houses, and a school. This map is perfect for exploring, roleplaying or just hanging out with your friends.

-Get your own bicycle and ride it around town.
-Bikes come in 7 colors to choose from, buy them at the bike vendor.
-Includes 5 skins!

projects.title: Steampunk Mobs
projects.description:
Straight from a steampunk world, these mobs have all the equipment they need to survive!

- 8 skins!

This set includes the following:

- Creeper
- Enderman
- Skeleton
- Spider
- Zombie
- Pig
- Ghast
- Slime

projects.title: Force Mobs Challenge
projects.description:
Force Mobs! A challenge with simple rules: Defeat different mobs following a given sequence. Careful... its more difficult than you think.
Overcome the challenge in any world or seed you choose!

Defeat mobs across all dimensions.
6 new, randomly generated structures.
Cool rewards.

This item uses random start areas for any new world. Endless possibilities!

projects.title: Isle of Draco
projects.description:
Shipwrecked and lost on a strange new island. Can you survive the island's terrible and hidden secrets?
Explore this beautiful island and the temples that lay scattered around it. 

-Roleplay as a shipwrecked survivor and conquer the new island you find yourself on.
-3 temples to explore.
-Custom terrain
-Awesome volcano

projects.title: Op Armour!
projects.description:
Power up with vibrant, futuristic armour and take on your friends and foes!
Choose between bright neon power armour including: green, pink, light blue and more!

+ 12 HD skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes futuristic and colorful Op armour skins!

projects.title: Winter Cliffside Villa
projects.description:
Get away from the sun and just relax inside your luxurious arctic villa! Gather around the fireplace and laugh the night away after a long adventure!

+Huge villa to explore!
+Cozy interior!
+Rooms for you and your friends!
+Amazing cliffside view!

And much more!

projects.title: Mont-Saint-Michel
projects.description:
Zoom around on your brightly colored moped and explore this huge island world steeped in history!

- Ancient island with detailed interiors
- Custom mopeds in many colors
- Harbour with ancient and modern ships
- 20 custom NPCs
- 8 HD skins

From the team at CrackedCubes

projects.title: Dragons
projects.description:
Conquer the sky and the world by flying and using your powers. You spread fear just by flapping your wings. Play as mystical and legendary dragons as you try this majestic skin pack!

+ 15 skins

projects.title: Frozen in Time
projects.description: There in the wilderness lies a forgotten city frozen in time. Explore the ruins of this old and ancient city either on your own or with friends. Discover the way of the old, and stay safe when exploring, because there might be dangers lurking beneath.

projects.title: Friholm Refuge
projects.description: On an island far from civilization lies a refuge for those that hold to the Old Ways: Friholm. You wake up here with no memory of your past, and face a choice: Will you settle in with the people that live here, or forge your own path in the surrounding wilderness?

projects.title: Crazy Villains
projects.description:
Rob banks with TNT, fly through the sky and avoid the cops as a Crazy Villain. No city, town or farm is safe with you around!

- See through the eyes of a villain
- 10 crazy skins!

projects.title: Mega Dungeon Crawler
projects.description:
Delve into the depths of an underground world riddled with monsters in this action minigame. Gear up for combat, plan your strategy and be victorious.
- +50 rooms with varied architectural and varied play style
- Shops, parkour, secret chambers, battle challenges...
- Epic boss fight against a fully customized enemy
- Infinite replayability. 1GB+ RAM Recommended

projects.title: 100 Days One Block
projects.description:
One Block is back but with some fun and unique twists! Try to survive for 100 days!
For each day you survive, you'll be rewarded and able to spawn islands! Take on the 100 Days One Block Challenge!

+ Quick play, normal and hardcore modes!
+ Random island spawner!
+ Quick play for a faster day cycle!
+ Fun and random survival experience!

projects.title: Anime Fighters
projects.description:
Grab your friends and join the brawl with these awesome anime fighters! 
Choose your fighter from a cool and colorful roster including bright haired fighters and powerful alien species! 

+ 12 super skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Vibrant, unique and powerful anime skins!

projects.title: Wondervale
projects.description:
Explore, discover hidden treasures and have fun in Wondervale! Here is what awaits you;

+ Fully furnished buildings with pleasant interiors.
+ A modern house for you to chill in.
+ Custom caves for exploring!
+ Parkour challenges with treasures at the end!
+ A theater all for yourself!

projects.title: Fungus & Fun Survival Spawn
projects.description:
The secret world of the gnomes has been discovered! Explore these shroomy territories while gearing for adventure!

- Survival spawn with tons of loot for a quick-start adventure
- Secrets galore! Enter the shroomy boat, the gnome castle or the mystic glowcap cave
- Play with friends and search for the easter egg

projects.title: Phantoms
projects.description:
Scare your friends, lurk in the shadows and time your moment just right for the ultimate jump scare! All you need now is a big castle to haunt!

- 8 skins!
- Ghosts, phantoms, skeletons! Pick which skin suits you best!

projects.title: Mob Camo!
projects.description:
The mobs are disguised and have blended into the environment with this Mob Camo pack!
Move stealthily through the biomes and battle your friends to find the strongest mob!

+ 12 HD camo skins!
+ 1 free HD skin!
+ Includes creeper, zombie, and axolotl skins!

projects.title: Better Biomes: Desert
projects.description:
No more boring deserts when you arrive at this lively pyramid oasis! Explore this hidden city of sand and try to survive the desert!

- Fully furnished houses, loot in every chest
- Custom underground cave systems
- Hidden objects in the desert, discover the meteor for rare ores

projects.title: Ultimate PvP Skins
projects.description: Do you have the soul of a warrior and want to show it? Now you can!\r\nShow your superiority in battle with these skins that will lead you to victory!\r\n+ 15 HD skins

projects.title: Bee Life!
projects.description:
Become a busy bee and choose your role from a selction of bee skins!
Contribute to the hive with construction bees or get down to business as a suit bee - the choice is yours!

+ 14 colourful skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes school, flight attendant, hoodie bees and more!

projects.title: Street Fashion
projects.description:
These teens are out to make a statement! With eye-catching dyed hairstyles and branded fashion trends you're sure to be the centre of attention out on the street. Show off your urban merch with Street Fashion!

- 8 skins!
- Pick the perfect outfit that suits you!

projects.title: Boys vs Girls
projects.description:
This pack allows you to dress up as any boy or girl! Whether it is a happy hippie or a hip skater! Roleplay with your friends and be the coolest, nerdiest or most stylish version of yourself!
+ 14 skins
+ 2 free skins
+ A large selection of outfits

projects.title: Bedwars Gladiators
projects.description:
Want to show the world who the best Bedwars player is? Then this pack is for you! Put on your Bedwars outfits and get your wins. Show who is the king and the best gladiator of the current war of beds!

+ 1 free skin
+ 20 Bedwars skins

projects.title: Blan Arena
projects.description:
You've found your way to Blan Arena, the place where warriors test their skills against each other. 
Are you the strongest among your friends? Come here to find out!

- Includes a town with custom homes worthy of heroic warriors
- Massive arena where you can battle against your rivals

projects.title: Sad Cats
projects.description:
Oh no, these cute cats are crying! Somehow they look even cuter when they're sad... how can we cheer them up?

- 8 adorable cat skins!
- Pick from many different breeds!

projects.title: Fall Fashion
projects.description:
Fall is here! It's time to bundle up with these new skins! Scarves, beanies, earmuffs, gloves, and layers!

- 8 skins
- Pick from a wide variety of outfits and pick the one that suits you best!

projects.title: Krampus
projects.description:
Have a dark and spooky holiday season with this Krampus themed pack!
Take control of Krampus and his army of evil minions that await your bidding!

+ 10 HD skins
+ 1 free skin
+ Includes Krampus, minion, and candy cane monster skins!

projects.title: Simple Spawns: Spruce Keep
projects.description:
Pack your bags, and get ready to move into this abandoned castle keep in a lush spruce forest! But be careful, there are bandits around!

- Explore the sturdy stone mansion!
- Discover caves and fight bandits!
- Multiplayer friendly Minecraft Survival Spawn!

projects.title: Elves
projects.description:
Deep in the forest biome, these magical elves live in peace and protect nature! From fancy high-fantasy outfits to crude druid-like designs, there's a perfect elf for you!

- 8 elf skins!
- Many different outfit designs so you can pick the skin that suits you best!

projects.title: Ender Family!
projects.description:
Grab this pack and join the enigmatic Ender Family!
Roleplay with your friends as different Ender family members skins!

+ 10 HD skins!
+ 1 free HD skin!
+ Includes adult, teen, and baby Ender skins!

projects.title: Simple Spawns Megataiga
projects.description:
A comfy town nestled amongst the tall trees of a boreal forest. The sound of cool, fresh water creeks running through the land gives this place a nostalgic and safe feeling.

- A quiet town suitable for a laid back comfy experience
- Lay back and enjoy the simple life.
- Share this experience with friends!

projects.title: Jungle Science
projects.description:
Waking up in a chasm below, you remember... a fall, a mysterious facility – abandoned and overgrown… Now, you’re left with a choice! Do you go back up from where you fell? Or venture deeper into the caverns before you?
-A humongous facility to explore!
-Monsters to fight!
-Treasure to find!
-Overcome the dangers!
-Conquer the dead!

projects.title: Halloween Megapack
projects.description:
Halloween is upon us again. Celebrate with a spooky megapack to suit every occasion!
With over 40 creepy skins you’ll have no trouble scaring your friends this haunted season. Roleplay as your favorite horror classics or try something new!

- Scary monsters and costumes pack
- 40 custom spooky skins +1 free skin!
- Ghost, vampire, werewolf, witch, zombie and many more!

projects.title: Darkness Army Tomb
projects.description:
Explore the dark lands of a mysterious warlord, discover where his terrible army rests. Try to survive in hostile and dangerous terrain. Do you dare venture into the tomb?

+ Large lava terrain
+ A mysterious tomb to explore
+ A new adventure that begins!

projects.title: Fire Mobs!
projects.description:
Fire Mobs have blazed a trail into Minecraft! 
Grab this fiery mob pack and battle it out with your friends!

+ 12 Fire Mobs skins!
+ 1 free skin!
+ Includes fire creeper, zombie, and axolotl skins!

projects.title: Simple Spawns Waterfall Palace
projects.description:
A beautiful Japanese inspired palace built high into the mountains and surrounded by waterfalls. This place is beautiful! Explore inside the palace walls, walk down the colorful pier, enjoy your new home!

- A majestic Japanese style palace.
- Riches and loot to be found.
- Play alone or with friends!

projects.title: Mythe Edhil
projects.description:
Discover the hidden jewel of Mythe Edhil: an elven relic of an era long gone. 

- Visit the bustling villages and meet the locals! 
- Become your own monarch of an ancient castle, a studious wizard of the arcane tower, or captain of your own pirate ship.
- Uncover ancient treasures that lie beneath if you're brave enough...

projects.title: Ambercrest Isle
projects.description:
Set sail to the beautiful island of Ambercrest - home to a glittering city full of friendly locals, a stunning royal palace, and daring gladiator battles! 

- How will you fare in the arena? Will you uncover this island's dark secret...?
- Take on the challenge and become the new hero of Ambercrest Isle!

projects.title: Mind Colors
projects.description: Get ready for an adventure with these beautiful player skins! Each skin is a unique representation of a set of emotions & feelings. Explore different aspects of the human personality.

projects.title: Robot Mobs
projects.description:
These advanced robot mobs are ready to troll some noobs! Whether it's a digiface creeper, or a scary wither bot, you'll be able to find the mob skin that suits you! Plus, what's scarier than a horde of robot zombies?

This pack includes the following skins:

- Creeper: Digital Head
- Spider
- Zombie
- Skeleton
- Enderman
- Wither
- Piglin
- Ghast
- Creeper: Mech Head

projects.title: Robots
projects.description:
Put on these robot outfits and set out to conquer the world of tomorrow! You are sure to go unnoticed with these robot outfits.
Also perfect for PvP and combat!
+ 1 free skin
+ 15 Robots skins

projects.title: Allay Mobs
projects.description:
Allay Mobs have just arrived in your world!
Look cool with the vibrant colors and glowing eyes of the new allay!

+ 12 Mob skins
+ 1 free skin
+ Includes vibrant Allay skins

projects.title: Free the Scientists
projects.description:
The scientists are stuck in their labs! Management have decided that it’s up to you to save them! Solve puzzles! Parkour through the labs! Free. The. Scientists!

- 15 Puzzle-Parkour levels!
- Rank system and collectible coffee mugs for added challenge!
- Single player.
- A fourth bullet point!

projects.title: Lucky Block Adventure
projects.description:
They say happiness is blind my dear friend! You travel distant lands just to find these shining, tempting lucky blocks!
Will you take a risk of opening them?

What awaits you? Amazing wealth or maybe are you going to summon terrible monsters? Now you have the opportunity to see for yourself!

-Includes three types of lucky blocks!

projects.title: Horns in Suits
projects.description:
Watch out! These demons have new suits and mean business!

- 10 skins
- different suits and outfits so you can pick your perfect skin!

projects.title: Mansion Getaway
projects.description:
Pack your bags for sandy beaches and a smiling sun! It’s time to vacation on a luxury island. Bring your friends and an extra swim trunk -- its time to hit the waves on a jet ski!

-8 free, tropical, beach ready skins
-15 colorful jet ski models to ride the waves
-Relax in a mansion and luxury yacht
-Beach tunes not included

projects.title: Medics
projects.description:
These medics are ready to help anyone in need! First build the hospital, and then get to work!

- 8 medic skins!
- Roleplay as a doctor, nurse, or surgeon!

projects.title: Advanced Skyblock
projects.description:
Experience classic Skyblock - and now, explore new worlds, complete quests, and gather supplies to free the islanders from the Skyblock King! Warning, not for noobs!

Custom mobs & animals:

- Rideable Dinosaur pets
- Cute Gingerbread men
- Orc Trader
- Elf Princess
- Gloomer Dragon folk

and many more!

Will you be the first to beat Advanced Skyblock?

projects.title: The Backrooms Yellow Suits
projects.description:
The Backrooms Yellow Suits have been researching and exploring The Backrooms slowly becoming infected!
Equip the correct Yellow Suit for your Backrooms journey or become an infected entity!

+ 10 HD skins!
+ 1 free HD skin!
+ Infected Backrooms skins

projects.title: Mushroom Mobs
projects.description:
These unique little mushroom animals are just the most adorable creatures you will ever meet! They are sure to make you fall in love with them! Show off your love of mushrooms with these cute outfits, and be ready for any woodland adventure that awaits! 

- 10 mushroom-themed skins
- Great for roleplay!

projects.title: Dragon Warriors!
projects.description:
Become a brutally powerful Dragon Warrior!
Equip your chosen skin and engage in mighty battles with your friends either with or against dragons!

+ 12 fierce and courageous skins with 2 that are FREE!
+ Includes mighty warrior character skins!

projects.title: Snowball Battle
projects.description:
The caves are bursting with monsters! Help defend the town from invaders in this small wintery town!

- Unique winter themed monsters with fun animations
- 7 waves including 2 boss waves, with difficulties to try
- Use turrets to help fight off the monsters
- Fight by yourself or in multiplayer

projects.title: Lucky Block Islands
projects.description: Try your luck as you adventure around the Lucky Block Islands!\r\nExplore the diverse islands and huge monuments to find lucky blocks with loot and resources!

projects.title: Block Camo! 2
projects.description:
Blend into any location with this second instalment of the block camo skin packs!
Hide in plain sight and suprise your friends!

+ 10 HD camos!
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes honey, ice and even furnace block camo and more!

projects.title: Cat Ears
projects.description:
These teens have found the perfect accessory for their awesome outfits... brand new cat ears! With a mixture between cool and cute, you'll stand out from any crowd!

- 8 cat ear skins!
- Different outfit designs so you can pick the skin that suits your style best!

projects.title: Underwater Base
projects.description:
Experience life underwater accompanied by aquatic creatures! Immerse yourself with the deep away from all to conduct your secret activity or live in peace.

+Fully furnished base!
+Huge base to explore!
+Aquatic creatures all around you!

And much more!

projects.title: Epic Sky Block
projects.description:
A lone island in the sky brings the most extreme survival challenge ever. With no resources, only skill and wit can save you from a certain demise!

-Revamped sky island survival experience

-Command-block fueled mission system

-Very challenging: micromanage resources, fight mobs, plan in advance

-Multiplayer ready! Share the adventure with friends

projects.title: Dinosaur Hunter
projects.description:
Your lifelong dream of meeting living dinosaurs is about to come true! The museum you work at needs your help: the visitor count is plummeting! Start your adventure, get some nice specimens and bring the museum back to its former glory.

-Lots of dinosaurs
-Thrilling mission system
-A great prehistoric adventure
-Gorgeous environments
-Multiplayer!

projects.title: Simple Spawns: Mist City
projects.description:
An empty, run down city, hidden in the mist. It seems hastily abandoned, but why? What could be lurking where the eye can't see? A spooky atmospheric survival spawn.

+ Massive buildings teeming with challenges.
+ An atmospheric city yours for the taking.
+ Treasures and loot to be found inside the building ruins.

projects.title: Growing Up
projects.description:
Take your character through their life's story with the 'Growing Up' skin pack! Perfect for roleplay, start out young and update your age group as you play until you're an elder!

- Roleplay as a character that is growing older
- Be the wise elder of your group, or the young up and comer!
- 3 characters, each with a skin for the young, middle aged, and elder age group.

projects.title: Portal to Millionaire's Bunker
projects.description:
The obsidian portal leads to the nether, but where does this quartz portal lead?
A multi-million bunker! Pass through the portal and see what lies beyond for yourself!

- 4 multi-million supercars!
- Open/closeable gates!
- Working lift inside the bunker!
- Huge bunker to explore!
- Vast farmland outside the bunker!

projects.title: Millionaire Underground Base
projects.description:
Take the lift underground and live in a huge secret base! With a small house on the surface, no one would know about your massive underground base!

+ Huge underground base!
+ Hidden from friend and foe!
+ Be the master of hiding!

projects.title: 80s Pack
projects.description:
Travel back in time a couple of decades and live through the 80s with the '80s Pack'! You can dress in the clothes of the era with this amazing assortment of role-paying options!

The skin pack features:
- 8 skins in different roles
- A variety of colorful clothing and accessories
- Live through the decade with different retro styles!

projects.title: Rainbow Armour!
projects.description:
Run, fight and protect the land in your Rainbow Armour suit!
Choose from a selection of colorful and uniquely designed suits!

+ 10 HD Skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes gold, turquoise, and rainbow skins!

projects.title: Ninja Mobs
projects.description:
These ninja mobs are masters of all martial arts! Learn long forgotten knowledge and become a true ninja legend!

- 8 skins!

This set includes:

- Creeper
- Zombie
- Pig
- Spider
- Enderman
- Ghast
- Slime
- Skeleton

projects.title: Raining Arrows
projects.description:
It's raining arrows and you have to race under the rain!
Play alone or with your friends and race to the end, see if you can survive!

-10 unique levels for you to race in!
-Singleplayer, multiplayer, and different game modes!
-Night mode to have monsters disturb your marathon!

projects.title: OP BOMB
projects.description: Unleash explosive mayhem with the OP BOMB Pack! Explore 20 devastating bombs and reshape Minecraft like never before. Boomtastic adventures await!

projects.title: Ruby Tools
projects.description:
Ruby Tools adds a new rare ore, a full tool set made out of rubies and ruby weapons to the Game.

-Full new tool-set & weapons
-Custom ore and block
-Unique medieval castle

projects.title: Cyan Adventurer
projects.description:
Explore the deep dark with the Cyan Adventurer Skin Pack. These cursed but skilled adventurers will strike fear into your opponents with their striking cyan appearance. Choose from a variety of styles and continue their legacy as daring explorers. Will you join their ranks? 

- 10 EPIC SKINS 
- Perfect for Adventure & Roleplay

projects.title: Above the Clouds
projects.description:
Soar above the clouds majestically!
Travel to distant, unexplored locations to scavenge for mysterious bounty!

- Epic monster fights!
- Objectives to fulfill!
- Fly high above the clouds with your very own pegasus!

projects.title: Optical Illusions
projects.description:
These skins will make everyone around you look twice! Inspired by famous optical illusions, these designs all have a unique trick to them that will confuse your friends while they try and figure it out!

- 8 mind-boggling skins
- Based on real life visual tricks!

projects.title: Great Pirate Bay
projects.description:
Yohoho matey! Time to set sail and discover the Great Pirate Bay, hideout of all corsairs! Your new adventure starts here! 

- A giant island with a hidden town!
- Fully decorated pirate hideout!
- Tons of different ships!

projects.title: Elder Quest
projects.description:
Only a strong mage can reign Brahomena. Become the destined evil sorcerer that will rule the land by harnessing the power of dark magic.

- Get new skills in exchange for gold
- Massive 1250x1250 block map replete action, adventure and exploration
- Move on foot, by horse or even flying! 
- Collect 6 Elder Stars to become almighty

projects.title: Sakura Teens
projects.description:
Wear the latest Japanese-inspired sakura clothing with this Sakura Teens skin pack!
Add to your wardrobe with pink and stylish sakura outfits and impress your friends!

+ 10 HD skins!
+ 1 free HD skin!
+ Includes boy and girl Sakura Teens skins!

projects.title: Ultimate Weapons
projects.description:
Craft and wield the Ultimate Weapons to obtain unbridled power. Wield cheat-like abilities and gain the upper hand in all combat.

+ Craftable, super powerful weapons.
+ Obtain abilities such as Force field, Gravity, Explosions & Teleport.

projects.title: Tropical Teens
projects.description:
Hey you!
We are in the middle of summer, and you still haven’t chosen a stylish outfit?
Then let us help you solve this problem!
We have eight colourful and unique skins among which everyone will find something for themselves!
Stand out from your friends, and feel summer vibes with our new skin pack!

projects.title: Better Villages
projects.description:
Choose between developing a basic village or make the more advanced village your own!
Fix up the houses and buildings into large, impressive structures!
Create better villages! 

+ Rewarding survival experience! 
+ Basic and advanced customizable villages!
+ Houses and buildings to develop!
+ Hidden chests with loot!

projects.title: Fruits in Boots
projects.description:
Behold! The galaxy's worst rhyme turned into a questionably stylish skin-pack!

-8 literal fruits in boots.
-A FREE Carrot skin! We did not invite them to the party, but we ain't complaining.
-Freshly made by MCVinnyq

projects.title: Fashion of Summer
projects.description:
BOINK! Summer is here, and so is the heat! Grab a popsicle, your favourite beach towel, and check out your local beach in these fun in the sun skins!

- 8 colourful skins!
- Various styles!
- Everyday fashion!

projects.title: Magic Skies Castle
projects.description:
Take your mining and crafting to the skies in this medieval-themed skyblock world of magical floating islands! Have an adventure in a castle up high! Navigate the islands in creative ways while searching for loot.

-Comfy terrain and relaxing environment.
-Islands with plenty of loot.
-Enjoy exploring on your own or with friends!

projects.title: Roleplay
projects.description:
Three survival spawns in one! Roleplay as the Anime Hero, Animal Lover or the Alien. Each character comes with their own house, music, HD skins, starting items and a crazy cool mount!

- Three survival spawns
- Three crazy mounts and particles
- Three fantastic music tracks and over 15 unique sounds
- Includes 6 Minecraft HD skins
- ALL FOR THE PRICE OF ONE!

projects.title: Simple Spawns Mining Village
projects.description:
After hearing the tales of an abandoned mining village lost in the mountains, you, an avid pickaxe wielder with an eye for shinnies have decided to make your way up there and take a look for yourself. 
- A cozy mining town to spend your days in.
- A steep canyon with caves to explore.
- Bring a mining buddy with you!

projects.title: Sharks
projects.description: With these shark skins you will surely not go unnoticed! Get these skins and show your friends which of you is the master of the seas! Guide your friends to discover the underwater temples with these shark skins!\r\n+ 1 free skin\r\n+ 10 shark skins

projects.title: Castle of Dranuvia
projects.description:
An Epic kingdom full of marvels and mysteries. Immerse yourself in the great halls of a titanic castle, walk through a medieval market and a harbor full of ships.
Adventure into the town where you can lose yourself in the beauty of an idyllic medieval kingdom.

- Expansive Castle
- Secret rooms & passages
- Flower fields, gardens, 3 guarded entrances

projects.title: Spy Mobs
projects.description:
These mobs are the pros, and know what they're doing! With the latest spy suits and tech, they're ready for anything!

This skin pack includes the following secret agent skins:

- Creeper
- Zombie
- Enderman
- Spider
- Skeleton
- Slime
- Piglin
- Ghast

projects.title: One Block Realms
projects.description:
One block like never before! Explore the map and conquer the challenges to unlock the desert, snow, mesa, nether, and the colorful realm! Can you survive?

- 6 unique realms to obtain various resources!
- 4 unique challenges!
- Classic area to explore all sorts of biomes!
- And much more!

projects.title: Secret 200 IQ Base
projects.description:
Others will walk cluelessly whilst there is a base underneath their feet! Open a secret entrance towards your secret base which is exactly in the middle of the road!

+200 IQ hidden base!
+Secret base for you to hide in!
+Custom-made secret entrance

projects.title: Skyblock Advanced
projects.description:
Make your way to the different skyblock islands and fulfill the requests of the spirits and golems and they will grant you rewards!
+ Multiple spirits and golems!
+ Various skyblock islands!
+ Cool trading system!
+ And more!

projects.title: Steampunk City of Crowhelm
projects.description:
Welcome to a retreat of gears and steam powered machinery in this steampunk style adventure! Ride in a blimp or settle into a cozy mechanical cottage below in this unique age of technological revolution!

-Command a city of old technology!
-Explore this world of unique gear powered machines!

projects.title: Rainbow Valley
projects.description:
A fun farm town to explore with friends! With many colorful houses to live in with your friends.

- Custom terrain with colorful housing!
- Farms and houses to explore!
- Areas to fish!

projects.title: Lucky Block Teens!
projects.description:
The Lucky Block Teens have appeared in Minecraft!
Feeling lucky? Dress as a lucky block teen, mini, or even an actual lucky block!

+ 12 HD Skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes lucky block teens and more!

projects.title: Frozen Anime Teens
projects.description:
Everyone LOVES stylish fashion, so don't be left out! This skinpack gives you the hottest trends in the world of TEEN FASHION! Pick your favourite outfit & show off to your friends!

- 8 Quirky Skins
- Wide variety of outfits!

projects.title: Port a Base
projects.description:
Experience the brand new survival experience where you bring your base inside of a shopping bag!
Mine diamonds and other minerals to buy your very own portable base!

- 9 unique bases are available!
- Placeable anywhere outside of spawn!
- Pick your base up and place it exactly as it was!
- And much more!

projects.title: Space Run
projects.description:
Trippy, fast-paced, thrilling. Three words to describe this manhunt mini-game. Can you catch all the Runners? Will you be fast enough? Will you be SMART enough?
Strengthen your nerves! Your heartbeat is about to go through the roof.

- Unlock all the characters by collecting Space Coins
- Play the game you want to play by choosing which options to enable
- Multiplayer only

projects.title: Galaxy Heads
projects.description:
These skins are out of this world!
-Cute space-themed skins! Each character is a unique galaxy.
-Planets, aliens and rocket ships. 
-By Razzleberries

projects.title: Mob X-Rays
projects.description:
Mobs have been X-rayed! Check out a creepers skeleton or the inside of a zombie!
Choose your favorite Mob!

+ 10 X-ray skins!
+ 1 free skin!
+ Includes creeper, zombie and spider X-rays!

projects.title: Farms of Ice
projects.description:
Adventure into this frozen wasteland populated with a dark and powerful village of savages. Discover what mysterious secrets the clan is hiding in this heavily guarded frozen fortress.

- Discover a new type of village filled with loot
- A brand new adventure with dungeons and bosses
- A land of ice that is yours to claim and explore

projects.title: Modern Millionaire Island
projects.description:
Hop on in and live in an exclusive and stunning millionaire island. Featuring a luxurious mansion, private beach, sparkling pool. The perfect destination for players looking to live like a true millionaire.

+A whole private island for you to explore!
+Perfect for RP shenanigans with friends!

projects.title: Unicorns
projects.description:
Journey across this magical fairy tale land! Re-populate the mystical unicorns to restore the kingdom to its once former glory!

+ Magical colorful unicorns!
+ Epic story and world building!
+ Fun gameplay exploration and breeding system!
+ 8 unicorn themed skins!

projects.title: Simple Spawns: Sand City
projects.description:
Sand! It’s everywhere! Surely there is something else worth the hassle. Those giant bones in the desert might be a good place to start looking. Dangers abound for the unprepared adventurer.

+ A vast desert for the gutsiest of adventurers to challenge.
+ Beautiful desert town for explorers to wind down in.
+ Riches and loot to be discovered.

projects.title: Emojis
projects.description:
Express yourself with these iconic emoji faces! What mood are you feeling right now?

- 8 skins!
- A variety of different emojis including Smirking, Cry Laughing, Zany, and more!

projects.title: Advanced Mecha
projects.description:
Advances in technology have made it possible to create new robots, but with all this evolution new monsters have also appeared. Please defeat them!

+ 4 robots to play and interact with,
+ Aliens,
+ Arena to fight with your friends,
+ And a lot to explore

projects.title: Extreme Survival Biome Blocks
projects.description:
Set off across the vibrant Biome Blocks of Minecraft and try to survive!
Explore the unique and floating biomes teaming with secrets to uncover!


+ Various unique biomes to explore!
+ Vibrant environments and wildlife!
+ Hidden chests with loot! 
+ Fun and rewarding survival adventure!

projects.title: Mob Onesies
projects.description:
Get cozy with this big selection of awesome mob onesies! This is perfect chance for you to become the mob you love or hate... and maybe even scare your friends!
+ 18 skins
+ 2 free skins!
+ A large selection of different mob outfits!

projects.title: School Fashion
projects.description:
These teens are looking sharp with their brand new school uniforms! From rolled up sleeves to designer shoes, they're probably breaking a couple of rules!

- 8 skins!
- Wide variety of skin designs and outfits so you can pick one that suits you

projects.title: Magic Skies Nether
projects.description:
Take your mining and crafting to the skies in this Nether-themed skyblock world of magical floating islands! Experience the fiery desolate scenery while exploring the islands for loot. Visibility is low so watch your step! Can you survive?

-Dangerous & challenging nether environment.
-Collect loot on various islands.
-Explore on your own or with friends!

projects.title: Parkour Survival in the Sky
projects.description:
Get ready for this part survival, part parkour experience! Explore these sky islands in this survival map with fun parkour challenges! Watch your step! It's a long way down... 

+ Beautiful architecture and buildings to explore and loot.
+ 4 skins included!
+ Challenge your friends to parkour matches.

projects.title: Simple Spawns Bungalow Retreat
projects.description:
You’ve arrived at your vacation destination. A quiet, beach-side bungalow retreat. It’s time to kick back, relax and take in the sun. What a treat!

A comfy beachside town with plenty of bungalow-style accommodations for you to pick from.
Your own personal Yacht, docked at the private pier.
Share this vacation destination with your friends or enjoy it by yourself.

projects.title: Eggspress
projects.description:
Do you think you can find all the hidden colorful eggs? It may seem easy, but it isn’t! Get ready for a challenging egg-hunt!

- 20 wacky levels!
- 122 eggs, some of which are invisible!
- Catch the 20 evasive Eggspress rabbits
- Time trial mode with reward system
- Stuck? Locate extra hard-to-find eggs with the detection tool!

projects.title: Private Millionaire Estate
projects.description:
A millionaire's mansion with everything a wealthy person could dream of! Delicate, cozy, and luxurious interior design throughout. All this, exclusively for you!

+Chill in and explore a fancy private estate.
+Ride around in cool sports car.
+Fully decorated interiors!

projects.title: Demon Land
projects.description:
Show your horns as you scare away all the intruder Minecraft mobs invading your world. Try different horn shapes and be the trendiest among all your friends. Are you ready to try now?

+ 10 demon-themed skins!
+ Perfect for roleplay!

projects.title: Flame Skulls
projects.description:
Flame Skulls have scorched their way into your world! 
Burn the brightest with a unique Flame Skull head and fashionable streetwear!

+ 12 Flame Skulls skins!
+ 1 free skin!
+ Includes stylish Flame Skulls skins!

projects.title: The Restroom
projects.description: Something supernatural is afoot. You are a plumber battling... spooky toilet monsters?! Fix haunted toilets, avoid evil creatures, save the bathroom world and make it out of that WC alive! \r\nWill you take the plunge-er? You don't get paid NEARLY enough...

projects.title: Secret Laboratory Bunker
projects.description:
Operation 'take over the laboratory bunker'. Secure the area and watch your back! This secret underground laboratory is full of valuables and probably a handful of baddies too!

- Explore the structure.
- Loot it for goods.
- Take over, secure and control

projects.title: Linear Ancient City
projects.description: An entire city built in one straight line! Linear City brings you a massive ancient metropolis with a labyrinth of interconnected structures, houses and temples. Careful you don't get lost! \r\n- Includes 8 skins.

projects.title: Abandoned Ruins
projects.description: On the edge of a forest lies the abandoned ruins of a long-forgotten city. Now only bandits and the corpses of the dead roam the overgrown settlement. Do you have what it takes to venture out and explore?

projects.title: Hollowwind Landing
projects.description:
Sail away to this coastal paradise, explore an island and trade with the towns people! Take a villa for your own and live a quiet life by the sea or take the whole island! The journey is yours at Hollowwind landing!

- Trade with a bustling coastal village of people.
- Live on a custom island with 3 towns and secrets in the outskirts.

projects.title: Trelleborg Viking Settlement
projects.description: Ever wondered how the vikings really lived? Visit this true to life recreation of the viking ring castle of Trelleborg in Denmark. Constructed by the famous King Harald Bluetooth in year 980, it's now ready to be explored!\r\n\r\n- Explore this real life location inside of Minecraft

projects.title: Farmers
projects.description:
You are looking for tranquility, a secluded place. You need fresh air and you want to get back in touch with nature. Cultivate your beautiful lands on your own land by playing as one of the farmers available in this skin pack!

+ 2 free skins
+ 15 skins

projects.title: Rainbow Camo!
projects.description:
Do you like colorful rainbows? Do you like playing hide-and-seek with your friends? Well, these are the perfect skins for you! Choose your favorite color and hide now!

+ 10 HD skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Hide while your friends try to find you!

projects.title: Nether Biomes
projects.description:
The dark forces of the Nether have corrupted the heart of the Overworld. Do you have what it takes to survive this hellish spawn?
- Great location variety: 10 new hellish environments
- Challenging Nether mobs are available early
- Kickstart your adventure with extra Nether items
- Get help from your friends. Multiplayer ready!

projects.title: Crazy Chunk Survival
projects.description:
The Minecraft world shattered to pieces and chunks are all over the sky! Can you survive in this harsh survival adventure?

- 16 sky-reaching chunks filled with gameplay
- Amazing environments
- Help Berny in his quest to get a lifetime supply of wheat
- Fight the Ender Skeleton in The End
- Complete 21 survival-oriented objectives

projects.title: Skyland Crystal Mines
projects.description:
Welcome to Skyland, a super computer simulation. The adventure is great but the dangers are greater. Watch your back, these floating islands are treacherous. Are you up for the rising challenge?

-Three difficulties
-Collect the resources to survive.
-Take on newer and bigger challenges.

projects.title: Summer Wave
projects.description: Surf the Summer Wave! Feel the summer vibe and enjoy the heat, bringing the joy, energy, and sun of the hottest season right into your battles. Perfect for those sunny combats and turning the battlefield into a beachfront!\r\n- 10 Skins

projects.title: Vampires
projects.description:
These fancy vampires are kings and queens of the night! Lurking in the shadows, ready to pounce!

- 8 vampire skins!
- Different outfits and designs so you can pick the skin that suits you most!

projects.title: Streamer Simulator
projects.description:
Start from small beginnings streaming to 0 viewers in your Mom's basement.
Then grow a GIANT audience and live on an island mansion - this is Streamer Simulator!

+ Stream 5 custom mini-games to gain subscribers and coins!
+ Random bonus events!
+ Tons of custom streaming equipment!
+ Customize your streaming setup!
+ 2 free skins included!
+ And more!

projects.title: Noob vs Pro vs Hacker Base
projects.description:
Noob, Pro or Hacker? It's your choice! Start out with the bare minimum, live the comfy life or go above and beyond. A hacker's home wouldn't be complete without a high-tech security system to ensure any hostiles stay out!

+ Working security system!
+ Your base's security is under your control!

projects.title: Rubrick Cube Challenge
projects.description:
Introducing you to one of the hardest maps in existence: Rubricks Cube Challenge! Are you brave enough to take on the challenge?

+26 cubes with unique challenges!
+Complete the central cube with missing pieces to complete the challenge!

And much more

projects.title: Skywars Fighters
projects.description: The skywars are raging! Fight the best you can, defeat your enemies to be the king of the islands! Play as these charismatic and tough characters available in the Skywars Fighters pack. There's something for everyone!\r\n+ 1 free skin\r\n+ 15 skins

projects.title: Magic Mages
projects.description:
Cast spells or duel with your friends as powerful, elemental and colorful magic mages!
Roleplay as many different mage. Choose your side light or dark.

+ 14 magical skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes elemental, light and dark mages!

projects.title: Cyber Geos
projects.description:
Enter the cyber universe with this futuristic-themed skinset!
Take your game to the next level with Cyber Geos!

- 8 Unique Skins
- Digital outfits with neon colors!

projects.title: Simple Spawns Jungle Ruins
projects.description:
You are a castaway who's landed on a lush green jungle island. Venture through this uncharted territory and find the resources to survive!

+ Comfy villages built into the treetops.
+ Old abandoned temples and ruins to investigate.
+ Ancient hidden treasures and ample resources!

projects.title: Lucky Block Race
projects.description:
Feeling lucky? Race with your friends to the end in this exhilarating mini-game and see who has better luck!
Use what you've been given to win and may luck be on your side!

- Mini-game suited for a large number of players!
- Over 40+ possible outcomes!
- 4 playable teams!

projects.title: Kimonos!
projects.description:
Dress up in traditional and colorful Kimonos made from the finest Japanese material!
Impress your friends with your favorite color kimono!

+ 12 colorful Kimonos skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes vibrant kimono skins!

projects.title: A Giant's Tale
projects.description:
Get ready for an experience like no other in this anime inspired tale and become a hero to protect this sacred land!

- Journey in a vast new map filled with lots of loot and lore!
- Live under the shadow of the great giant in a magical forest!
- Claim the role of hero and defend the world from evil!

projects.title: Cliffside Millionaire Mansion
projects.description:
A beautiful and luxurious mansion for those who love a good view and aren't afraid of heights! Live in the most expensive house in Minecraftia!

+ 3D modeled vehicles!
+ Infinity pool!
+ Massive modern mansion!
+ Play survival in luxury!
+ And more!

projects.title: Billionaire Mansion
projects.description:
Are you exhausted from the monotony of your daily routine? Well... how about this instead? A home that anticipates your every need. A state-of-the-art billionaire's mansion! Bid farewell to mundane tasks and indulge in the joys of life! 
+ Automatic farms 
+ A Helicopter 
+ Jet skis 
+ Chests with valuable items

projects.title: Mob Animatronics!
projects.description:
Fear-inducing Mob Animatronics have been seen haunting Minecraft!
Jump-scare and terrify your friends with this scary skin pack!

+ 12 HD skins!
+ 1 free HD skin!
+ Includes Creeper, Skeleton, and Enderman animatronics skins!

projects.title: RGB Team
projects.description: Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant RGB characters, each splashed with their favorite colors! These playful skins bring a burst of fun to your Minecraft adventures! Express your unique style with timeless designs and stand out in multiplayer games!\r\n- 10 RGB skins!

projects.title: Nether Dimension
projects.description:
These Nether skins have come from another dimension! Featuring abstract designs, Endermen, Nether portals, and more!

- 8 skins!
- With a wide selection of designs to choose from, you can pick the one that suits your style best!

projects.title: Barrier Battles
projects.description:
Hurry to gather your resources before time runs out and the barriers collapse!
Then use your pool of resources to battle it out with your friends! 

+ Various types of loot and resources! 
+ Competitive PvP action!
+ Exhilarating time-based gameplay!
+ Multiplayer only, 2 - 4 players required.

projects.title: Spoettrup Burg
projects.description: Ever wondered how nobles of the Renaissance really lived? Visit this true to life recreation of the renaissance castle Spoettrup in Denmark. Inhabited by various nobels from 1400 till 1937, it's now ready to be explored!

projects.title: Millionaire Island Base
projects.description:
Don't judge a book by its cover really stands for this tiny, yet humungous house! Explore the island and brace yourself for the luxurious lifestyle in store!

+Majestic and huge mansion to explore!
+Fresh atmosphere to start your adventure!

And much more

projects.title: Streamers
projects.description:
Ever wanted to be a professional Minecraft streamer? Pick your streamer skin and become world famous!

- Pick from assorted streamer designs
- A wide variety of expressions, including crying, raging, and happy
- Stylish clothing including hoodies, punk styles, and cute outfits

projects.title: Ultimate Underwater Base
projects.description:
Ease your mind as your base is impenetrable! Accompanied with high-tech security systems at your disposal to keep your base safe from unwanted visitors!

+Working security cameras!
+Working laser gates!
+Working iron gates!
+Activate the sharks!

And much more

projects.title: Goth Anime Teens
projects.description:
Do you love the goth aesthetic AND anime style? Goth and anime haven't been better matched before now! Show off your "weeby" and edgy style to your friends with the cutest skins. Convince them to join you!

+ 10 skins! 
+ Perfect for horror city maps and more!

projects.title: Secret Lava House
projects.description:
Under the thick layer of lava lies a secret underground lair waiting for you! Explore, customize, and set it as your ultimate hide-out!

+Hide from your friends!
+Huge base to explore!
+Comes with a swimming pool, entertainment room, etc

projects.title: Designer Outfits
projects.description:
Fresh off the clothing racks, these designer outfits look good on anyone! Get them while they're in fashion!

- 8 skins
- Many different outfit designs so you can express your own unique style!

projects.title: Golden Mobs Jobs
projects.description:
Animals that think they are human, am I hallucinating? Wait, animals that work as policemen, firemen or doctors, is that supernatural? And on top of that, these mobs are all golden? 
Play as one of the golden mobs in the Golden Mobs Jobs pack and make your friends jealous with these golden outfits! 
+ 1 free skin
+ 56 skins to discover
+ a style full of sparkle

projects.title: Rainbow Sam and Anna
projects.description:
Discover the legend of Rainbow Sam & Anna with this mysterious pack!
Become a powerful, colorful legend and battle it out with your friends! 

+ 12 Rainbow Sam & Anna Skins
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes rainbow, boss, and corrupted skins!

projects.title: Creeper Camo!
projects.description:
Hide in different environments with these Creeper Camo skins!
Sneak, charge and blast your friends!

+ 14 HD skins!
+ 1 free HD skin!
+ Includes water, lava, and grass Creeper Camo skins!

projects.title: Anime Mechs
projects.description:
Take to the skies with these powerful mech suits! With a wide variety of mech styles and colours to choose from you will have no trouble picking a design that suits you.

- 16 HD skins
- Includes a wide variety of styles, including a military and law enforcement design.
- Includes 4 Pilot skins
- 1 FREE skin! Gratis!

Which mech will you choose?

projects.title: Space Explorers
projects.description:
No astronaut can explore the universe without the right equipment, luckily the Space Explorers skin pack has all the essentials!

- Includes 7 different space suits and an Alien Officer skin
- Select a suit from multiple styles, including retro and modern
- Pack includes a 3 person team called the 'Alpha Squad'

projects.title: Hidden Mountain Bunker
projects.description:
You've stumbled upon an abandoned bunker, hidden deep inside a mountain. It's been undisturbed for a long time, but was left well stocked! Time to make this your new base of operations.

- Claim an awesome hidden bunker built into a mountain.
- Make use of all the free supplies you can find.
- Enjoy the facilities by yourself or with friends!

projects.title: Extreme Survival: Void
projects.description:
Make your way from island to island in this mysterious skyblock experience where the sun is covered by bedrock and you are left in the dark void. Survive and unveil what rewards the islands hold.

+ Multiple hidden chests with rewards!
+ Multiple explorable skyblocks!
+ Various kinds of monsters!
+ And more!

projects.title: Luxury Anime Outfits
projects.description:
Take over a modern city in style! Discover the new skin pack full of luxury hoodies, expensive shoes, and designer T-shirts. Become the most popular anime teen among your friends. Step into the world of fashion & set a new mind-blowing trend!
Are you ready to become a legend in this Minecraft universe? Choose your style!

-2 free skins
-14 skins
-Anime inspired

projects.title: Modern Hillside Mansion
projects.description:
Live in the most luxurious mansion ever and claim it as your home! Gather around, play hide & seek, do various outdoor activities, and more!

+Huge mansion to explore!
+Outdoor activities!
+Fun activities!
+Live alone or with your friends!

And much more

projects.title: Magic Skies Desert
projects.description:
Take your mining and crafting to the skies in this desert-themed skyblock world of magical floating islands! Hop on this adventure up high. Find creative ways to navigate through the islands. Collect resources and watch your step! Become a master of the skies.

-Desert themed environment.
-Collect loot on various islands.
-Enjoy exploring on your own or with friends!

projects.title: Enchanted Forest
projects.description:
In a far away forest under the branches of a tremendous tree, you will find a hidden world of enchantment. Come visit and explore, in Enchanted Forest!
+ Fairies and fireflies!
+ Giant custom explorable tree!
+ Mushroom cottages!
+ Mushroom men and imps!
+ And more!

projects.title: Secret Underground Base
projects.description:
Pass through the hidden entrance and live in a luxurious hidden base without any unwanted visitors!

+Massive underground base!
+Secret passage to your hidden base!
+Secret entrance!
+Camouflage door!
+Hide from your friends in a secret hideaway

projects.title: Slimes
projects.description:
The slimes have broken free and the lab is in chaos! Run rampant with your friends as one of the gooey pranksters or suit up as a member of the lab staff!

- 14 skins
- Play as cute slime creatures, including a rare rainbow slime, and a swamp monster slime!
- A shiny slime skin for every occasion
- Be slime, or one of the lab staff, including a robot assistant!

projects.title: Cherry Blossom Castle
projects.description:
Make yourself at home in this elegant castle with detailed interiors! Find useful items to aid your journey and enjoy the adventure on your own or invite some friends along.

+ A large interior rich castle.
+ A small village made of cherry trees.
+ Super fun for roleplay!

projects.title: Waterblock
projects.description:
Ahoy!
A new archipelago on the horizon!
Look at this wreck! someone definitely had a bad day here.
According to the map, this area is low in natural resources. However, we will find a lot of treasure chests here.
Okay it’s time for adventure!

-Classical survival experience in the middle of the ocean.
-Find all treasures!

projects.title: Demon Agents
projects.description:
These demon teens have new suits, and are ready to spy! Watch out for their horns, they're sharp!

- 8 demon skins with a variety of suit designs
- Formal attire perfect for agents, important business, spying, or just looking fancy!

projects.title: Whispering Sands
projects.description:
Explore the sandy coast of this island paradise in search of dark secrets held within. Look for the temples and ruins of an island tribe lost to time. Pick up your scuba gear and get lost in this tropical adventure!

-Search the island for treasure & ruined temples.
-Find the remains of a tribe lost to the ocean.
-Make the island your home and live in a tropical paradise.

projects.title: Spleef Battle Arenas
projects.description:
Enjoy this revamped spleef minigame. Enter the arena and stay alert as blocks crumble under your feet! How long can you stand within the battleground?
-15 arenas
-Test your skills in Survival and Mob Spleef Time Attack
-Play with friends in Multiplayer Battle and Pandemonium
-Use an ultrafast pickaxe, special items and event invocations.

projects.title: Battle Suits
projects.description:
Team, equip your 'Battle Suits' and prepare for combat!
- Powerful armor for every hero and villain alike
- Unique colors and designs for every member of your squad
- Be ready for anything, from petty criminals to an alien invasion
- By Razzleberries

projects.title: Maids & Butlers
projects.description:
These maids and butlers run a very tight ship! Make sure to wipe your feet before you step inside!

- 12 unique skins to suit any millionaires mansion!
- With a wide variety of uniform designs, you can find the perfect fancy skin to suit you!

projects.title: Wilton Castle
projects.description:
This icy castle has been abandoned. Explore its halls and discover its secrets. Survive a frigid environment and beware the lurking dangers. Conquer the challenges in your path and become royalty!

-Explore the castle village.
-Discover the castle secrets.
-Gather all the loot in the palace and become powerful!

projects.title: The Acropolis
projects.description:
Journey back in time to a more civilized age. Enter the acropolis of Rome and explore the great empire. Rule over your world as a king! Gear up in the spartan armories and be ready to fight for your new kingdom!

-Explore the streets of the greatest empire to ever grace the earth.

-Build your empire out and beyond to distant lands to claim all of Minecraft as your own!

projects.title: Little Spider Italy
projects.description: You have arrived at a half abandoned, spider-infested, but remarkably well-kept Italian city at the ocean's side. Do you venture out and explore the city for the riches it hides, or do you not dare?

projects.title: Red Embodiments
projects.description:
Set it all ablaze with the "Red Embodiments" skinpack! Choose from a variety of fiery red avatar designs bursting with personality and crazy patterns. Ignite your adventures with bold, captivating looks that stand out wherever you go! 

- 10 cool skins 
- Lots of red!

projects.title: Random Skins
projects.description: With this skinpack, only one thing is certain... you'll be surprised and have fun discovering which character you will become next! Make each reveal an exciting experience!\r\n+Includes 12 skins!

projects.title: Alien Pyramids
projects.description: Ever heard the theory that the ancient pyramids might actually be made by aliens? Well, these pyramids certainly are alien pyramids, full of treasure and dangerous monsters! Ready to be explored! Just don’t be too greedy, the pyramids are well guarded.

projects.title: Overpower Grid
projects.description: You spawn in a small center island surrounded by a circular grid of larger islands. There are overpowered items scattered throughout! The route you take can determine whether things will be a breeze or kind of a pain! \r\n+ Lots of overpowered loot to collect. \r\n+ A challenging game mode where your choice matters!

projects.title: Advanced Mobs
projects.description:
Hidden away in a laboratory of experiments are mobs that have mutated into the shape you see before you! Venture out in to the lands and you will encounter them! They are not friendly, so have your crafted weapons ready. Good luck!

+ Various kinds of new monsters!
+ Explorable laboratory!
+ Exciting new experiance!
+ And more!

projects.title: Skyblock Cubes
projects.description: Dear wayfarer! Reality is just a sum of individual feelings towards objective space. 12 cubes all around you are like canvases for the artist. Your world your rules. Creating is the ultimate goal of everyone who wanders here. Survive by adjusting the conditions imposed on you. Skyblock at it’s finest. Good luck!

projects.title: Teen Crowns
projects.description:
These teens are royalty and they're studying hard, getting ready to be kings and queens! Those crowns are valuable so be careful!

- 8 royal skins!
- Different designs and outfits so you can pick the skin that suits you best!

projects.title: Dragonfist Dojo
projects.description:
Enter the last dojo where the Dragonfist fighting style is taught. Only true adventurers arrive here! Do you dare to unveil the secrets of the temple?
- Action-packed, highly detailed world
- Oriental-inspired buildings and epic architecture
- Exploration-oriented! Find hidden chests with loot!
- Ride on giant colourful dragons
- Multiplayer ready!

projects.title: ABC Daycare
projects.description:
A playful skinpack that has teachers and children from ABC Daycare! Includes a free skin!

+ 14 unique skins!
+ Male and female versions!
+ Pizza, unicorn and car variants included!

projects.title: Norius: Mushroom Palace
projects.description:
Welcome to the world of Norius! Your adventures have brought you to the great mushroom palace! What adventures wait for you around the fungus city? Find out for yourself!

- Set up shop in the market!
- Defend the city from hostile mobs!
- Explore the world of Norius!
- Multiplayer-friendly Minecraft survival spawn!

projects.title: Cottage Town
projects.description:
A cozy town with lots of cottages to explore or live in.

- Many cottages to live in!
- Big farms to tend to!
- Big mountains to hike up!

projects.title: Fear the Rain
projects.description: Stuck in a super-secret science facility your job (being a clone and all) is to risk life and limbs when inevitably you venture out to save the world from that pesky deadly rain, which has been destroying the world for the last 1010101010111010101+ iterations of this failsafe. Good luck! Oh, and the constant rain will kill you.

projects.title: Gingerbread People
projects.description:
Now you can make your festive dreams come true and become a real, living and breathing gingerbread person with this skin pack! 
But keep your eyes open... as some of your friends might be hungry and try to eat you!

+ 12 HD skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Become the most delicious gingerbread person in all of Minecraft!

projects.title: Cliffside Millionaire Estate
projects.description:
A beautiful and luxurious cliffside mansion tailored to aficionados of panoramic beauty! Step outside, breathe in, embrace the view and start your day!

+ Huge mansion to explore!
+ Perfect for RP or Survival experiences.
+ Invite your friends along!

projects.title: Astronaut Mobs
projects.description:
Space explorers are no longer safe from Creepers now that these astronaut mobs have taken to the stars!

- 8 skins!

This pack includes the following:

- Creeper
- Zombie
- Spider
- Enderman
- Pig
- Ghast
- Slime
- Skeleton

projects.title: Weapons Expansion
projects.description:
Create your weapon of choice and wield its unique power to exterminate evil foes! Wield the power of the Sun, Moon, Fire, or even the Beast! Create a powerful combo by using multiple swords!

+ Craftable weapons!
+ Custom animations & effects!
+ 5 FREE skins

projects.title: Winter Wear
projects.description:
Be ready for the snow, the 'Winter Wear' pack is now available!

- Stay warm this winter with cute sweaters, scarfs, beanies and earmuffs!

- Keep the snow out your hair, and be dressed so you stay warm and cozy

- With fuzzy boots to match your sweet coat, there's no way you'll catch a cold!

projects.title: God Tree Base
projects.description:
Ever lived under a tree before? Unlike that small tree, come and live in a tree that has been on Earth since the very beginning!
Be one with nature itself and have fun discovering new areas in the base!

- Live alone or with friends!
- Full interior for all your necessities!
- Expand your base and look down upon the world!
- And more!

projects.title: Extreme Survival Half Heart
projects.description:
Half a heart Minecraft survival! Descend a giant mountain and try to survive...
Embark on this challenging but fun adventure!

+ Towering mountain with hidden areas and buildings!
+ Half heart health gauge!
+ Different armor sets to find!
+ Multiple chests and barrels with loot!
+ And more!

projects.title: Mob High School
projects.description:
Schools in! Dress as your favorite, creepy and colorful mob!
This pack includes a black spider boy, pink creeper school girl and ender dragon boy.

+ 16 HD Skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes unique high school mob species!

projects.title: Bottles n' Biomes
projects.description:
Survive in this bottled up experience! Spot the correct jar and travel through the clouds to reach your destination!
Are you ready for the challenge? Experience world in a jar! Where everything you need is in a jar.. somewhere!

-Fresh new experience!
-Fun to play alone or with friends!
-Relaxing yet exciting new gameplay!
-Expand your world and create your home jar!

projects.title: Lava vs Water Camo
projects.description:
Choose your element with scorching lava or crashing water camos!
Camouflage in lava and water and hide from your friends!

+ 8 HD camos!
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes lava and water skins!

projects.title: Sand City
projects.description:
In the distant land of the sand desert, the harsh sun beats down on the parched earth, scorching everything in its path. Despite the unforgiving conditions, life still persists...

- Follow the clues in the written scriptures across the city and find treasure!
- Valuable resources can be found buried beneath the sandy surface.
- Multiplayer ready!

projects.title: The Floater
projects.description:
A new challenge awaits! Float your way up dodging obstacles and reach the top in this minigame! Can you arrive at the finish line without crashing?
- 20 different colorful tubes
- Arcade-like addictive gameplay
- Highly responsive controls
- Challenging minigame: fail and you start over
- Bring your friends: multiplayer ready map!

projects.title: Animal Cosplay
projects.description:
Cuteness overload! Put on your onesie and travel the world showing how cute, fluffy, fuzzy, or feathery you are!

- 8 unique skins!
- 1 FREE skin!
- Includes panda, white fox, penguin, and much more!

projects.title: City of Olympus
projects.description: Explore the mysteries this island has to offer, from the dark caves to the bright city! Discover secrets within the palace walls; the possibilities are endless!

projects.title: Ultimate Island Base
projects.description: Be one with nature and make this your ultimate base! Explore and expand your fantastic underground base alone or with friends!\r\nDiscover what this base has to offer and start your adventure here!

projects.title: Skyblockers!
projects.description:
Explore, survive and take on the skyblock challenges in style with this pack!
Dress for success whilst embarking on your skyblock experience!

+ 10 HD Skins
+ Includes 1 free skin!
+ Includes tree, chest and lightning bolt outfits!

projects.title: Cyberpunk Space Station
projects.description:
Welcome space traveler, to this futuristic outpost of the human civilization! Explore this space station in search of stuff to survive and start your new adventure! 

-A large space station! 
-A big spaceship! 
-Your new adventure

projects.title: Cops & Robbers
projects.description:
Roleplay in a world divided by crime. You must choose your side. Protect the people or live among the lawless. Play as either a robber, prisoner, guard, officer or S.W.A.T member!

14 HD skins!
1 free skin included!

projects.title: Bounty of the Sea
projects.description:
Be the most wanted person on the vast sea! Pick your role in the crew and sail away!

-10 Unique skins to choose from!
-1 FREE Skin included!
- Includes the captain, first crew, cannoneer, ghost, and much more to choose from the crew!

projects.title: Bee Friends
projects.description:
Fill your Minecraft world with sweet and fun honey bees! This skinpack is full of cute bee-themed costumes. Add a sweet touch to your gameplay! 

+ 10 cute skins! 
+ Perfect for roleplaying!

projects.title: The Cat Nest
projects.description:
Are you a cat lover? Then you are in for a surprise. Explore this hidden paradise that all felines long for and meet your new fluffy adventure companions.
-4 new cat breeds!
-Creepers won't spawn! Build without worries
-Kickstart your adventure: overpowered loot, low difficulty, less monsters...
-Become the Cat Master and create an empire

projects.title: Lucky Skyblock: Dungeons
projects.description:
Floating ruins, strange creatures, and mysterious journal fragments.
With 8 dungeons, 3 unique boss fights and 4 new mobs to play with, it's Lucky Block and Sky Block combined like never before!
Explore, solve puzzles, build, and survive to a custom soundtrack.

-Beautiful skyblock ruins!
-Lucky Blocks!
-Custom mobs!
-Custom textures and music!

projects.title: Dinosaur Teens
projects.description: Have you ever dreamed of being a dinosaur? Now you can with the Dinosaur Teens skin pack that return you to ancient times!\r\n\r\n+ 15 skins

projects.title: Mob Knights
projects.description:
With their tough armor and diamond swords, these mob knights are ready for any quest that comes their way!

- 8 medieval skins to choose from!
- Includes Creeper, Enderman, Pig, Zombie, and many more!

projects.title: Mob Life Cycle
projects.description:
Have you wanted to witness the life cycle of your favorite mob?
With the Mob Life Cycle pack play as a baby, a fully grown adult, or old mob!

+ 12 mob life cycle skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes baby zombie, enderman and old creeper mobs!

projects.title: Pixel Pets Meadow
projects.description:
Embark on a whimsical journey in "Pixel Pets Meadow," a world where you collect and take care of cute companions smaller than a block! These pets, each possessing distinct abilities, accompany you on your adventures, enhancing your exploration and overcoming obstacles. Forge unbreakable bonds with your pixel pals for an unforgettable experience!

-Tiny
-Mini
-Small
-Cute

projects.title: Mega City 2
projects.description:
Mega City 2! The successor to "the biggest city you have ever seen" only BIGGER. Every single building is accessible, fully furnished and decorated. Don't get lost, its a concrete jungle out there!

- Hundreds of fully furnished buildings.
- Visit fancy Yachts out on the bay.
- Relax on the beach or get star struck at the outdoor auditorium!

projects.title: Doggos
projects.description:
Welcome to the dog nursery! Ever wanted to have a dog in Minecraft that you could pet and play with? On this map, you can play with various kinds of dogs!

+ Various kinds of dogs!
+ Explorable dog nursery!
+ Multiple tricks!
+ And more!

projects.title: More Parkour
projects.description:
Experience 200 grid parkour levels! Spanning all Minecraft biomes in one map. Begin in the overworld and jump your way to The End! Add another level of challenge with the speed run system. Improve your times and set new records! 
- 200 levels and 10 different themes 
- Speedrun system 
- Difficulty increases as you go!

projects.title: Area 51 Alien Invasion
projects.description:
Earth is under attack! An alien mothership is wreaking havoc while UFOs spread destruction. Our only hope is the military power hidden at AREA 51!
- Action-packed, highly detailed sci-fi world
- Survive hordes of enemies and collect valuable loot
- Explore the huge alien mothership and the secret military base
- Multiplayer ready!

projects.title: Backrooms Explorers
projects.description:
Backrooms Explorers are investigating the endless Backrooms in hazmat suits!
Explore The Backrooms with your friends equipped with unique and secure suits!

+ 12 unique Backrooms Explorers skins!
+ 1 free skin!

projects.title: Underwater Base Survival
projects.description:
Below the surface of the ocean, you will find this underwater base! A world filled with treasure, pirate graves, hidden chambers and danger. Can you survive?
+ Custom built terrain and points of interest!
+ Special items to discover that make survival easier!
+ Discoverable ship and secret chambers!
+ Multiple islands to search and find!
+ And more!

projects.title: Animal Onesies
projects.description:
Prepare for the ultimate slumber party! Animal Onesies has all the cute and wild animals you'll need this winter. Turn your school into a zoo! Roleplay as pets! Farm, jungle, city or sky, there's a skin for every habitat. When you're done with your adventure, get in bed for a cosy sleepover!

- 18 skins!
- Girl and boy version of each animal
- Free dragon skin! Gratis!

projects.title: Lucky Block Furniture
projects.description:
Do you like Lucky Blocks or Furniture? How about both!? Experience the best of both worlds today:

- Over 60 furniture pieces for decorating your mansion! (Only usable in this world)
- Advanced furniture tools and Lucky Motorcycles!
- Be on the lookout for gold and diamond versions of each item!
- Are you lucky?
- By King Cube & Razzleberries

projects.title: Japanese Spirits HD
projects.description:
More unique yokai spirits have been discovered but this time in HD!
Sneak around as a two-tailed cat, spin webs like a spider girl, or scare your friends as a ghost!

+ 10 HD skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes giant skeleton, oni and kitsune skins!

projects.title: Luxury Spring Mobs
projects.description:
Spring has come! Try out a luxurious spring look with a mob twist! Put away your drab winter fashion and trade up for an elegant spring outfit.

- Mobs with a fashion sense! 
- 8 different skins!

projects.title: Merry Megapack
projects.description:
Celebrate the holidays with the ultimate megapack skin set! With 40 skins to pick from, you'll be able to find the perfect skin for you. Put on some festive music, equip a skin, and let the holiday season begin!

- With 40 skins to choose from you can play as Santa Claus, Gingerbread Man, Snowman, A Pile of Gifts, or a Christmas Tree!
- 1 free bonus skin! Gratis!

projects.title: Lucky Block Presents
projects.description:
Have the luckiest Christmas ever with this lucky block spin-off pack - Lucky Block Presents!
Take a chance with your friends and you may unwrap an epic gift or an unlucky piece of coal!

+ 10 HD Skins
+ 1 free skin
+ Includes mini present and present skins!

projects.title: Frost Age
projects.description:
The wonders of this frozen world remain hidden. Only a fearless explorer can uncover the secrets of these ice cold lands. Are you up to the challenge?
-Interact with penguins, mammoths-even crystal golems!
-Explore the map to find loot
