-Battle against enemies old and new
-Immerse yourself in a detailed icy world
-Wander alone or bring company along!

projects.title: Modern Mansion
projects.description:
Experience a luxurious lifestyle in your modern mansion worth a million dollars! Live the dream in the millionaire's mansion and start your adventure today!

+Explore a luxury mansion.
+Enjoy its modern design!
+Live the rich life on your own or bring some friends.

projects.title: Seaside Mansion Villa
projects.description:
Have your very own luxurious seaside villa! Hold gatherings on your yacht, garden, or inside and relax after a long survival trip!

+Huge mansion to explore!
+Outdoor activities!
+A huge yacht for you and your friends!
+Amazing ocean breeze!

And much more

projects.title: Dwarven Base
projects.description:
Have you ever dreamed of controlling mighty dwarven base? A wonderful underground city is waiting for you!

+ Huge subterranean dwarven structures.
+ Hunt for treasures underground!

projects.title: Caveblock
projects.description: Thank you for signing up for our cave exploration program. What? You don't remember signing anything? Since you are already here, could you find all the caves and kill the dragon for us? Don't bother mining for resources. You should find everything that you need in the chests scattered in the caves. I would give you the map, but, sadly there is none! Good luck!

projects.title: No Faces
projects.description:
No Faces arrive in dark and scary style!
Stand out with black and white aesthetic clothing!

+ 12 No Faces skins!
+ 1 free skin!
+ Includes scary No Faces!

projects.title: Slime Mobs
projects.description:
Uh oh, it looks like these mobs have turned into slimes! Good thing these glass containers are keeping them safe... well, as long as they don't break at least!

- Play as Creeper, Skeleton, Enderman and more in their slime form!
- Perfect for standing out in the crowd!

projects.title: MC But: You Burn in the Sun
projects.description:
It's a survival world but... you burn in the sun like a zombie! Start out as the last survior of an underground race, surrounded by the bleached ruins of your peoples' empire.

- Challenge yourself to build roads and bases shaded from the sun!
- Add something fresh to your survival gameplay!
- Hide from the scorching sun!
- Multiplayer friendly!

projects.title: Rich Teens
projects.description: Ready to live your best life as a rich teenager in your youth? This pack is for you! Try the Rich Teens skin pack now!\r\n\r\n+ 15 skins

projects.title: Cracked Eggs
projects.description:
These eggs have just hatched and they're looking to have some fun!
Cracked Eggs is a unique set full of splat-tastic characters. Just don't fall into any lava!

- 8 Eggciting Skins
- Pick out the egg that suits you most!

projects.title: Autumn Friends
projects.description: Autumn has finally arrived! As we enter the windy season, make sure you are wearing the most stylish sweaters. Be ready to welcome the fall with these comfy autumn themed skins!\r\n\r\n- 12 skins to choose from!

projects.title: Thinking Emojis
projects.description:
Are you thinking while you're doing something else? Thinking while being angry? Thinking while crying? Thinking while thinking? Thinking like a zombie? This pack is made for you!
Have fun with your friends sharing your emotions by using different emojis that think, with each of them different expressions.

14 HD skins
100% of thinking emojis

projects.title: Simple Spawns Pirate Port
projects.description:
We sailing off to more frigid waters mateys! Tales speak of an abandoned island on the cold side of the sea. Many a pirate has tried to sale through the icy slush to reach whatever treasures are left to plunder, none have made it until now…

-An entire port to claim as your own.
-Explore the shipwrecks and discover treasures.
-Enjoy the adventure alone or with some mates!

projects.title: 8Bit Animals
projects.description:
8Bit Animals are teeny tiny but will provide you with some big fun!

-Choose from a cat, dog, bear, bunny, dragon and other animals!
-Cute, colourful and small! They have it all.
-By Razzleberries

projects.title: Space Explorers HD
projects.description:
They're back, and better than ever! These Space Explorers have all the right equipment that any astronaut might need!

- Includes 7 different HD skins space suits and an additional alien skin
- Select a suit from multiple styles, including retro and modern
- Pack includes a 3 person team called the 'Alpha Squad'

projects.title: Hidden Leaf Village
projects.description:
Deep in the woods and hidden from society, a peaceful village is found.
Explore what this place has to offer and live in harmony with the surrounding nature.

- Welcoming you as the village chief!
- Fully furnished rooms!
- Includes bedroom, kitchen, blacksmith, and much more!

projects.title: Jump On Every Block!
projects.description:
Jump on every block in this epic parkour challenge!
Prove your insane parkour skills by jumping on every single block within Minecraft to reach the end goal!

+ Includes all Minecraft blocks!
+ Fun and challenging parkour experience!
+ Checkpoint gold blocks!

projects.title: Frenzy Runner
projects.description:
Show your dexterity traversing challenging parkour: impossible jumps, ultrafast corridors, tricky sections! Ready, steady, go!

- 8 seamlessly assembled levels with unique landscapes!
- 3 game modes: creative, survival or time trial
- 5 hard-to-find shortcuts
- Collect 100 stars and unlock the Dragon Suit
- Single player only

projects.title: Magic Skies Anime
projects.description:
Take your mining and crafting to the skies in this Japanese inspired skyblock world of magical floating islands! Travel around, search for loot, investigate the pagodas! Immerse yourself and chill.

-Comfy terrain and relaxing environment.
-Islands with plenty of loot.
-Enjoy exploring on your own or with friends!

projects.title: Free Choice Anime
projects.description:
Super anime teens come into action! Dyed hair, expensive clothes, fashionable accessories, and trendy hoodies will make you stand out from the crowd. Discover a new pack full of amazing characters and feel like your favorite anime hero. Show others that you know fashion by choosing from these stylish friends!

-1 free skin
-anime vibe
-luxury clothes

projects.title: Skyblock Donuts
projects.description:
Say goodbye to boredom forever! Welcome to paradise, where there is an infinite amount of fun and tasty donuts all around. Wander around a peaceful forest, scavenge the donuts for ores, conquer a nether fortress, explore a mysterious end city, and so much more! Skyblock just got a lot tastier!

- 4 HD skins
- Fun skyblock adventure

projects.title: Muddle
projects.description:
A bright RPG medieval style texture pack.

- Adorable animals and villagers
- Wild update is now here!
- Super cute fantasy theme
- Colorful and fun!

projects.title: Comic Chaos
projects.description:
Heroes VS Villains, who will win?
- Play as a variety of heroes, ready to take on evil!
- Take the role of a super villain plotting to take over the world!
- These colourful skins will give you plenty of roleplaying options.

projects.title: Animal Cosplay
projects.description: Adorable animal cosplay skins! Put your costume on and wander around the world showing how cute you are with 8 unique choices to choose from!\r\n\r\n+8 unique skins

projects.title: Camp Retreat
projects.description:
A fun campsite to explore and roleplay! With many colorful cabins to live in with your friends.

-Custom terrain with colorful housing!
-Farms and cabins to explore!
-Areas to fish and farm.
-Cool modern furniture models to decorate your cabin.

projects.title: Wolf Craft
projects.description:
Many moons ago a castle fell into ruin and was overrun by creatures not quite human nor animal. The Pack is always recruiting if you can bring that which they value most to their shrine… bone! Will you be able to win their favor? 
+ Large, rideable Wolf Mount!
+ Magic shrine to trade bone for reputation!
+ Custom mobs, sounds and loot!
+ Huge explorable custom caves!

projects.title: Hidden Bunker Lab
projects.description:
Welcome to the hidden lab! You are now in charge of these facilities. Make use of the valuable resources provided. Plan your next adventure from your new secret base!

- A huge underground lab to explore.
- Tons of resources available all around the lab.
- Play on your own or invite friends along!

projects.title: Secret Agents
projects.description:
Drop into action with this sneaky pack! Be prepared for any mission with different types of secret agents or an operative! Suit up and head out!

+ 12 HD skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Role-play as a variety of different secret agents!

projects.title: Epic Islands Flatrock
projects.description:
Play an epic survival island! Flatrock is home to a kingdom of fishermen, iron golems, and giant caves! Can you free yourself from the outside world and make this survival island your home?

- Explore the castle kingdom!
- Discover massive caves, and abandoned houses around the island!
- Multiplayer friendly survival island challenge!

projects.title: Skyblock 2
projects.description:
Skyblock 2 has arrived! Play all of your favourite sky survival gamemodes in 23 seperate experiences.

+ Play multiplayer with your friends
+ Custom inventory saving system
+ Infinity Skyblock
+ One Block
+ Lucky Block
+ Mega Block
+ 100 Days
+ Quests
+ Hardcore modes
+ Original Skyblock
+ Parkour
+ All content from our first Skyblock map

projects.title: Crowned Fashion Leaders
projects.description:
Here comes royalty, the crowned fashion leaders! They are so cool, all eyes are on their stage. Wear these magnificent royal crowns and get all that attention.

+ 12 crowned-themed skins
+ Perfect for roleplay

projects.title: Lucky Cursed Gems
projects.description:
Relics that have come to life thanks to the magic of the Puppy Duppy Berries!
They will bring out all your power, discover what you have inside and dazzle the whole world with these striking skins!

+80 skins!
+10 styles!
+8 colors to choose from

projects.title: Lucky Blockers
projects.description:
Run away quickly with your lucky blocks before they get stolen! If you're lucky enough, you'll get big surprises! To enjoy them, try this pack right now!

+ 15 skins
+ A lot of luck

projects.title: Decocraft
projects.description:
Decocraft has come to Bedrock! Enhance your creativity and personalize your worlds with all kinds of home deco! Elevate your interiors with modern, functional, and animated furniture with this one-of-a-kind addon. 

Over 1000 placeable decorations.
And more to come!

projects.title: Paramedics
projects.description: They provide front-line emergency services and care when they arrive on the scene. Help your fellow man by playing a character from the Paramedics skin pack!\r\n\r\n- 15 skins

projects.title: Beachside Vacation Mansion
projects.description:
If you're looking for your dream home, look no further. Live by the amazing view as your home is by the beachside! Inhale the refreshing breeze and enjoy your cozy mansion!

+Huge millionaire's mansion to explore!
+Beautiful beach to go swimming and have fun!

And much more

projects.title: Items Alive!
projects.description:
Grab this random and funny 'Items Alive' skin pack!
Dress as an item and make your friends laugh with varied expressions!

+ 12 Items Alive skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes health potion, emerald, and redstone skins!

projects.title: The Great Temple
projects.description:
Discover a huge temple full of secrets. Be careful though. Not everything is as peaceful as it seems. Will you survive the dangers within?

- Redstone mechanisms everywhere! 
- Find the Relic and the 8 secret emeralds
- Unlock further areas with 3 Star Keys
- Solve demanding puzzles, dodge treacherous traps, jump across moving platforms!

projects.title: Illager Island
projects.description:
Welcome to the home of the only real civilized Illagers. Explore the docks, the colorful town and the lost library hidden beneath the island. Gather treasure, gear up and defeat the bookies to free the island and defeat their evil king!

- Explore Illager Island
- Includes an Illager skin pack
- Gear up for the Lost Library
- Beware of Booky mobs!

projects.title: Space Mobs
projects.description:
Be careful astronauts, these mobs have new space suits and have advanced to the space age! Space explorers and aliens alike are no longer safe from Creepers!

This pack includes the following mob skins:

- Piglin
- Skeleton
- Bee
- Creeper
- Zombie
- Enderman
- Ghast
- Spider
- Zombie Piglin

projects.title: Roleplay: Middle School
projects.description:
The bell is ringing! Time to hop into some middle school roleplay! This map includes a comfy little middle school and a cute town to explore!
- Roleplay as a student or maybe even a teacher!
- Explore the school and the neighboring town.
- Invite your friends to join you in this world!

projects.title: Extreme Survival Caves
projects.description:
Explore and survive deep within the giant, sprawling caves!
Journey through the huge cave system in this unique survival experience! 

+ Deep and expansive caves to explore!
+ Vibrant biomes and environments!
+ Multiple hidden chests with loot!
+ And more!

projects.title: Plasmatron Citadel
projects.description:
The people of Plasmatron need energy, but their power plant isn't enough! To solve the issue they overloaded the central, but this entails many risks.
- Survive in the thunderstorm. Watch out for charged creepers!
- Find 5 hidden newspapers that unveil the story
- Explore a vast and detailed sci-fi world
- Kick-start your adventure with useful loot

projects.title: Digifaces HD
projects.description:
Digifaces are back with an HD coat of paint!

-These upgraded robots are colourful, futuristic and unique
-Show off your upgrades! Each bot has a special ability as shown by their face image
-By Razzleberries

projects.title: Letters
projects.description:
Letters in black suits are here!
Choose your favourite letter and play with your friends!

+ 12 Letter skins!
+ 1 free skin!

projects.title: Prison Break!
projects.description:
These criminals have busted out of jail and are on the run! Quick, someone catch these robbers before they get away!

- 8 different skins!
- Wide variety of designs ranging from cat burglar outfits to orange jumpsuits!
- Perfect for jailbreak and cops vs robbers roleplay!

projects.title: Castle Retreat
projects.description:
Make yourself comfy in a cozy mansion in the middle of a woodland realm. 
Get the most out of your time discovering secret rooms, managing your lands, and riding all kinds of horses in stables nearby.
Each location contains creative tasks, invent your own solution to cope with them! 
Be the king in your castle and modify your lands as only you wish!

projects.title: More Creepers!
projects.description:
An explosive survival experience filled with specialized creepers with fun effects! Drop in and have a blast!

+ 10 different custom creepers!
+ Special loot drops!
+ Magic, cake, molten, wither, wolf and nuke variants included!

projects.title: Enderlands
projects.description:
Corruption has spread into the overworld! Take to the wilds in this strange new landscape. Hunt down the invading Ender mobs to gather rare materials. Craft powerful new weapons and defend the village from the looming threat!

- 7 custom Ender mobs
- Brand new overpowered weapons
- Custom Traders and NPCs

projects.title: Western Lands
projects.description:
Welcome Cowboy! Venture into the western lands, follow the train tracks and start a new adventure!

- Explore 2 western style towns.
- Bunker up in a sturdy wooden fort.
- Dive into a gold mine and experience that "gold rush"!

projects.title: Police
projects.description: Enforce justice in style with the "Police" skinpack! Choose your professional police officer look and patrol the virtual streets with authority. Serve, protect, and keep the Minecraft world safe! \r\n\r\n- 10 skins

projects.title: Hills of Tuscany
projects.description:
Visit the small hamlet tucked in the beautiful rolling hills of Tuscany and relax!
Ride around in quirky small cars and brightly colored scooters. Grab a bite to eat at the local restaurant and take in the sights!

- 6 scooters to choose from
- 5 car colors
- Custom furniture
- Come roleplay with your friends!
- Multiplayer ready

projects.title: Ice vs Fire
projects.description:
In an epic clash of ice and fire, this skinpack gives you the ultimate varity! Including a free skin!

+ 12 total skins included!
+ Girl and boy variants! 
+ Hoodies, suits, nerd glasses, dresses and stunner shades included!

projects.title: Rulers of the World
projects.description:
Unable to find a skin that conveys your magnificence and innate leadership abilities? Search no more, for the Kings of the World are before your eyes.

-Wise Caesar

-Beautiful pharaoh queen

-Mountain monarch

-Undaunted tzar

-Fair tribal chief

-Oasis king

-Brave Celtic queen

-Ruler of the Far East

-By ElRichMC & Razzleberries

projects.title: Scribbles: Colored Doodles
projects.description:
Show off your artistic side with colored-in Scribble skins!
Bring these vibrant doodles to life and take them on an adventure in the virtual world!

- 8 sketched skins
- Featuring Rainbow, Dinosaur, Space Cat and more!

projects.title: School Mobs
projects.description:
Travel back in time to when these mobs were still in school! Were they good students, or troublemakers?

- 8 skins!
- Pick your favorite mob, including Creeper, Enderman, Skeleton, Zombie, and more!

projects.title: The Lost Labyrinths
projects.description:
Proud of your navigation skills? Check these sense-numbing patience-stomping convoluted mazes. Not feeling so audacious now, uh?

- 5+ types of labyrinths: 3D, vertical, puzzle, uni and multicursal
- 25 mazes, increasingly bigger and harder
- Boss Levels! Fight your way through mobs! 
- Stuck? Use the skip tool to progress!

projects.title: Camo Ore!
projects.description:
Merge with the vibrant ore environment with this massive Camo Ore skin pack!
Find your ideal disguise and hide from your friends with normal, deepslate, and even nether ores!

+ 20 Camo Ore skins!
+ 1 free skin!
+ Includes a giant variety of camo ore skins!

projects.title: Simple Spawns: Wizard Tower
projects.description:
During your adventure, you stumble upon the forgotten homestead of a powerful wizard! Re-claim the farm, mine in the caves, and grow your power in the magic crumbling tower!

- Become a powerful wizard!
- Move your furniture into your new farmhouse!
- Multiplayer friendly Minecraft Survival Spawn!

projects.title: Brides and Grooms
projects.description:
Listen to those wedding bells... these couples are completely in love and are getting married!

- 8 skins!
- Pick your favorite bride or groom skin and celebrate true love!

projects.title: Trucks
projects.description:
Have you ever dreamt of being a truck driver? Out on the open road, just you and your trusty truck. Well here’s the perfect opportunity to become just that!
- Drive custom trucks in-game!
- Complete missions to buy upgrades!
- Characters with dialogue at load pick-up locations!
- Roads, roadmaps, signs and a showroom!

projects.title: Deathrun
projects.description:
Runner or Death?
As a runner, get to the finish line as fast as you can while dodging Death's ruthless traps!
As Death, you have all sorts of traps at your disposal to hinder the runner's success!

- Mini-game suited for a large number of players!
- Freedom to choose your role!
- Minimum of 2 players to start the thrill!

projects.title: Elven Plains
projects.description:
Comfy simple life vibes, farm land and fields as far as the eye can see. Explore the hillside built homes, each with its own unique cozy interiors. 
Enjoy the landscapes in the Elven Plains!

+ Every building has different interiors.
+ Chests with valuable or semi-valuable items in every house!
+ Underground, high fantasy-like houses

projects.title: Maymeda Isles
projects.description:
You find yourself stranded in the wreck of a cargo ship. The ship has crashed into the beach and several containers have fallen off. You will find plenty of supplies to survive on the island. What kind of adventure awaits on this treacherous tropical land?
-explore forgotten ruins
-find relics of a war from the past
-search for the ruins of villages

projects.title: MC But: Mobs Drop Random Loot
projects.description:
It's a survival world but... mobs drop random loot when they die! Start out in a beautiful village and explore a world where every mob drops a surprise! Updated to include new 1.19 mobs!

- Random loot tables for mobs!
- Add something fresh to your survival gameplay!
- Build interesting farms!
- Multiplayer friendly!

projects.title: Space 2033
projects.description:
The universe is in danger. The Alien Stones have been stolen, and their locations are unknown. We fear for the worst. Quick! Jump on your spaceship and start the adventure! Good luck, space cadet.
-Immersive environments and CTM action
-Ride five amazing spaceships
-Custom sci-fi weapons
-Raid motherships and space stations
-Multiplayer ready

projects.title: The Last Bastion
projects.description:
A super-advanced people built their perfect city on an ancient island, separate from everyone else. But they were too greedy and destroyed themselves. Now nothing remains but the haunting remnants of their once-great city.
- Explore a post apocalyptic island!
- Brave the primitive towers surrounding the island!
- Make your home among the ruins of the past!

projects.title: Block Camo Mobs
projects.description:
Camouflage yourself with this Block Camo Mobs pack! Hide and vanish from your friends whilst being a camouflaged mob!

+ 10 HD camo skins
+ Disguise as a creeper, zombie, spider and more

projects.title: Simple Spawns: Submarine
projects.description:
You've landed yourself in a sub-aquatic research facility. Exploring the deep sea won't be easy. Beware of aquatic menaces in the unexplored sunken temple.

+ A vast sunken city in the middle of the ocean.
+ Incredible facilities to make into your expedition base.
+ Riches untold for those who manage to dive deep enough.

projects.title: City Builders
projects.description: You want to build buildings? Roads? Leisure places? And build everything in a city? Well, join one of these builders by playing one of them in this City Builders pack!\r\n\r\n+ 12 skins

projects.title: Lords of the Isles
projects.description:
Long since forgotten and left abandoned to the ages. Can you rebuild the beautiful castles and become the new Lord of the Isles? Adventure your way around these sky isles and find their hidden secrets and loot.

- One world
- Multiple Islands to explore
- Skyblock style play

projects.title: Forgotten Valley
projects.description:
Waking up in a forgotten valley, a path lies before you! Explore the old city, gather treasure, gear up, but beware the mysterious tower!

-Explore the Forgotten Valley!
-Gear up in the ancient city!
-Tackle the dungeon in the mysterious tower!
-Enjoy a mix of survival and adventurous fun!

projects.title: Future Special Force
projects.description:
Join the special force from the future and take on the most dangerous tasks there is!
Pick your role from 10 unique choices and show the world that you're in a special force!

- 10 unique skins to choose from!
- 1 FREE skin included!
- Includes the chief, assassin, rogue, medic, and much more to choose from the future force!

projects.title: Astro Skyblock
projects.description:
You are a wanderer through space. You meander through the endless depths of the cosmos looking for opportunities.
Another celestial body on the horizon...What awaits you this time?
All systems are operational.
-Classic skyblock in a refreshed edition.
-Includes thematic texture pack with 8 redesigned mobs.

projects.title: The Explorer's Waystones
projects.description:
Travel anywhere in style! This Add-On lets you discover and craft waystones to quickly warp around. Grab your wayfinder to teleport back home or to lands far away. Watch the trailer to see how!

- 43 player crafted waystones
- 9 biome themed waystones
- 4 different wayfinders
- 16 warp elevators to quickly travel vertically
- A Master waystone to act as your travel hub!

projects.title: Summer Holidays
projects.description:
Summer is here! Classes are over and it's time to have fun! Text your friends, get ready and go out to enjoy the summer life!
-Sunny roleplay setting
-Adds 16 pieces of new custom content, from clothes to vehicles, and much more!
-Go fishing at the lake, scare the kids at the camp, sunbathe at the beach or win prizes at the fair.
-Multiplayer ready!

projects.title: REGICIDE
projects.description:
The old king has died and villains have taken the thrones. They are causing suffering across the realm. Can you be a hero? It's time for regicide!
- Full-fledged lore narrated via NPCs
- 5 brutally imposing castles
- 4 challenging battles against the evil kings
- Complete secondary missions to get additional gear
- Combat-oriented adventure map

projects.title: One Block Dragons
projects.description: ONE BLOCK Dragons adds a new twist to your favorite mode!\r\n\r\nRide your Dragons through the sky and build your One Block Dragons kingdom, one block at a time.

projects.title: Medieval Floating Kingdom
projects.description:
Begin your new adventure ! Join the skyblock world and explore the kingdom! Build your home, craft your tools and fight the monsters!

+ Classic survival in the air
+ Giant kingdom to explore
+ Floating villages
+ Huge castle

projects.title: Billionaire Teens
projects.description:
These billionaire teens have it all, giant mansions, awesome super cars, and all the latest fashion from their favorite brands!

- 8 billionaire skins!
- Wide variety of skin designs and outfits!

projects.title: Summer Teens
projects.description: Enjoy the holidays, the ice cream, the sea, the beach and the sun. Try the Summer Teens skin pack and have a great summer!\r\n+ 15 skins

projects.title: Miners
projects.description:
This specialty team of miners are the best in the business! If you're exploring, digging an underground base, or looking for diamonds, minerals, or gems, you definitely want this squad in your corner!

- 14 HD Skins
- Each skin has an 'On-Duty' and 'Off-Duty' variation

projects.title: Neon Skins
projects.description:
These brightly colored neon skins are straight out of the cyber-verse! Illuminate your world with these neon designs!

- 8 skins!
- Different designs and color combos so you can pick the skin that suits your style best!

projects.title: Neon Street Teens!
projects.description:
Neon Street Teens have arrived in Minecraft glowing with style!
Select your favorite vibrant neon street outfit and stand out from your friends with this fashionable pack!

+ 12 dazzling teens skins!
+ 1 free skin!

projects.title: Nethoran Castle
projects.description:
You've found an ancient castle lost in legend. Attempts to open a portal to another world have met with disastrous failure. Now the castle & its surrounding town are barren, devoid of life. Except for you!

-Conquer the mines
-Plunder 15+ unique buildings!
-Discover the hidden room(s)
-Scale the castle to find the royal treasure
-Start off your adventure living like a king

projects.title: Mobs in Space
projects.description:
Look out astronauts, these mobs have taken to the stars! Space explorers and aliens alike are no longer safe from Creepers!

This pack includes the following mob spacesuit skins:
- Creeper
- Skeleton
- Bee
- Zombie
- Enderman
- Chicken
- Pig
- Slime

projects.title: Stranded Arctic
projects.description:
A huge disaster fell upon the world, covering it with eternal winter!
Will you be able to survive and have a place to call home once more?

+Brand new type of gamemode!
+Survive with barely anything!
+Create a place to call home once more!
+Hardcore survival!

projects.title: Lucky Block
projects.description:
Ever wanted to be a magician and pull a rabbit out of a hat? Today might be your lucky day! In lucky blocks, you will be pulling a lot of different things from blocks instead, whether it's the ability to fly or powerful monsters!

+ Various kinds of surprises!
+ Multiple explorable blocks!
+ Multiple abilities!
+ Powerful monsters!
+ And more!

projects.title: School Life
projects.description:
Do you love school? Then this map is perfect for you! You can role play as a school student, do quests, and even drive around in different vehicles!

+ Full story line!
+ Lots of 3D vehicles!
+ Big explorable city!
+ Lots of places to role play!
+ And more!

projects.title: Ultimate Secret Base
projects.description:
Just a normal day when you stumbled upon a weird looking floor. Turns out, it's a secret entrance!
Find out where the entrance leads and see for yourself what it has to offer!

- Custom 3D modeled secret hatch!
- Open/ Closeable hatch!
- Hide from your friends!

projects.title: Gamer Demons
projects.description:
What's the secret of a successful gamer? Get ready to find out!
Hop into your comfiest chair, put on your favorite headphones, and play some games as one of these hardcore demon idols. Become and look like the best out there! Show off your horns and make the other gamers think twice before taking you on.

+ 10 demon-themed skins! 
+ Have fun!

projects.title: Necropolis
projects.description:
You died! Don't worry though, your afterlife has only just begun. Welcome to Necropolis, where you can enjoy the rest of eternity in this iconic Mexican village!
- Custom texture pack with adorable traditional calaveras
- Explore the colorful town atop the tree of life
- Pay your respects at the gorgeous cemetery
- Frolic in the giant pumpkin patch
- By Razzleberries

projects.title: EVA Mech Pilots
projects.description:
Suit up as one of eight E.V.A Pilots! Explore new worlds with these futuristic skins. Outfitted with top of the line technology, you can prepare for any battle.

-8 futuristic skins
-Be a mech pilot!

projects.title: Winter Rest
projects.description:
Bundle up tightly, winter is here! Discover adorable creatures, ride a dog sleigh, take to the skies with a flying owl mount! When it gets dark, take shelter from the freezing weather in a warm, cozy winter cabin. The fireplace should keep you warm and toasty!

- New winter woodland creatures!
- Equippable backpack in 16 colors!
- 5 free skins!

projects.title: Tallest Tower Survival
projects.description:
Set off on your exciting adventure with Tallest Tower Survival!
Descend the many unique tower layers as you journey to the bottom of the tower!

+ Unique layers to survive and explore!
+ Vibrant biomes with related mobs!
+ Hidden chests with loot!
+ And more!

projects.title: Masked Teens!
projects.description:
The Masked Teens have swaggered into Minecraft!
Live out your fantasy with cool outfits and expressive masks!

+ 12 Masked Teen skins!
+ 1 FREE skin!
+ Includes boy and girl teen skins!

projects.title: Don't Leave the Circle!
projects.description:
Survival with a twist! Survive 15 days inside a circle and be rewarded with insane loot. Make the most of the resources you can find and make it to the end. Are you up to the challenge?

Here are the rules:
- Don't touch the red line.
- Get daily drops.
- Make it through 15 days.

projects.title: Animania
projects.description: Experience in-depth, animal husbandry on a farm! Breed & raise a variety of cows, pigs, sheep, goats and chickens. Care for livestock, collect their produce, process it and create delicious cheese, the highest-quality meat and other food stuffs. Hunt for truffles and collect every species of farm animal out there!\r\nFor big animal enthusiasts!\r\n+ Includes 4 skins.

projects.title: Space Skyblock
projects.description:
3. 2. 1. BLAST-OFF! 
Jet off into the starry night and explore lands never before seen! 
Hop on a high tech spaceship and discover magical ents, or even make the first contact with aliens!

- Space themed sky block islands and planets!
- Cool spaceships with particles!
- Fight corrupted Enderman!
- 12 ambient music tracks!
- 12 epic Minecraft skins!
- 7 amazing models!

projects.title: Shrine of the Creeper
projects.description:
To appease the wrath of the creepers the ancients created this shrine, but as time went by it became a shelter for the fearful monsters. Beware!
-Splendid architecture and massive layout!
-Fully customized Elemental Creepers
-Kickstart your adventure with extra loot
-Have fun exploring and fighting mobs
-Bring your friends. Multiplayer ready!

projects.title: MC But: You Fear the Dark
projects.description:
It's a survival world but... you're terrified of the dark! Start out as the last survivor of an underground race, surrounded by the rotting, mossy ruins of your peoples' empire.

- New fear mechanic!
- Don't spend too long in the dark or you'll face insanity and even death!
- Challenging new game mode.
- Multiplayer friendly!

projects.title: Anime Uniforms
projects.description:
Try on your new school uniform and roleplay as an anime character! Make your own school stories with your friends and look cute as you do it!

-16 custom, anime inspired school uniforms. With different alterations for each student!
-Diverse anime hair colors!
-HD outfits that stand out!

projects.title: Knights vs Orcs
projects.description:
Fight as brave, honorable knights or team up with fearsome orcs! 
This pack includes a knight champion, king orc and even an ogre!

+ 12 HD Skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes battle-ready knight and orc skins!

projects.title: Horrors vs Heroes
projects.description:
Celebrate this Halloween with over 20 HD skins! Be a monster or a survivor, from cool teens to creepy creatures.

The monsters in this scary pack are:

- Creeper
- Devil
- Clown
- Werewolf
- Spirit
- Alien Invader
- Cyborg
- Scarecrow
- Mummy
- Vampire
- Zombie Miner
- Multihead

Plus 9 survivor skins!

Which skin will you pick?

projects.title: Millionaire Underwater Base
projects.description:
Look out the window and treat yourself to a magical underwater experience!
Live a life underwater in total harmony with nature alone or with your friends!

- Fully furnished house!
- Live alone or with friends!
- Explore this huge underwater base!

projects.title: Gold Rush Ridge
projects.description:
In a small industrial city filled with caves, railways and mines, you’ll have endless possibilities… and gold! Don’t let the greed get to you, as you explore and prosper in Gold Rush Ridge!

-Ride the rails around town!
-Search for riches!
-Explore "The Goldmine" train!
-Detailed custom buildings with loot!
-and more!

projects.title: Festive Gifts!
projects.description:
Special delivery! These presents are wrapped and ready to be opened! What do these boxes contain? Blocks? Diamonds? Mob heads? There's only one way to find out! Pick a pile of gifts that suits you best!

- 8 gift skins!
- Wide variety of designs including a pile of packages!

projects.title: Actually Mount Olympus
projects.description:
Find out what the building on top of the mountain is! It's actually Mount Olympus!
Set your home there and have the magnificent view of everything from a worthy place on top of the mountain!

- Decorate the building to suit your style!
- Play alone or with friends!
- Fun exploration!

projects.title: CTM: The Nightmare Journey
projects.description:
You’ve been tasked with a soul-crushing, skill-demanding mission: conquering the nightmares in this strange world and completing the monument. Features include:
- Mid-difficulty hack’n’slash action with four objectives
- Vast areas with never-before-seen themes
- Ability to select gear from dozens of custom items
- Exploration, looting, and PvE-heavy action

projects.title: Minerdale Cliffside Ruins
projects.description:
The ancient ruins of Minerdale lie abandoned on the cliffs on the ocean's edge. Explore the ruins and make it your home to strike out into the vast world beyond! 

- Astounding scenery
- Mighty ruins
- Tall towers
- Deep ravines

projects.title: Secret Mountain Base
projects.description:
Embark on a journey with your boat and wander inside a mountain where a mythical tree and its secret village flourish in peace.

+Huge village to explore!
+Huge mythical tree!
+Adventure alone or with your friends into the unknown!

And much more

projects.title: Roleplay: Pop Stars
projects.description:
It's time to hit the stage! Have you ever dreamed of living the life of a pop star? Now you can with this pop star roleplay themed map! Explore the city, choose a fancy building to live in, climb up on stage and perform in the center of town!

-Roleplay your pop star dreams.
-A colorful stage to perform on.
-Explore the city with your friends.

projects.title: Survival in the Sky
projects.description:
Amazing views and ancient castle halls await you in this skybound adventure. Make your way through thick forests full of baddies and ghouls. Survive this hard mode difficulty sky island adventure.

+Includes 4 player skins!
+Several large sky islands to explore and loot to find.
+Optimized for the latest version of the game.

projects.title: Secret Bat Base
projects.description:
Wander past the waterfalls and discover a fully-equipped base made for heroes!
Become the mastermind with high-end facilities fitting for a technological expert!

- Jet black car, motorbike, and helicopter!
- Control-able waterfall entrance and helicopter entrance!
- A hidden base inside a cave!

projects.title: Tricksters!
projects.description:
The circus is here and these pranksters are pros at trolling! These jokers prank super heroes and villains alike, no one is safe from their trickery!

- Includes jesters, clowns, mimes and a ringmaster!
- Disguises include an assortment of masks, makeup, headgear, and accessories
- Troll your friends with the perfect costume!

projects.title: Teen Street Fashion
projects.description:
Dress up in modern clothes with the Teen Street Fashion skin pack. Wear pastels in the streets of Harujuku, or be dark and punk somewhere in the west - the choice is yours!

• Includes 12 different skins, representing different modern fashion trends!
• From pastels to high fashion, to punk and dark themes.
• Includes 2 free skins for any fashionista!

projects.title: Power Suits
projects.description:
Check out these brand new power suits! Make it clear to everyone that you're well equipped, and ready to handle anything!

- 8 skins
- Pick the perfect armor for you!

projects.title: Animal Care
projects.description:
Animal care system, many more animal textures, an animal selling station, and even a rare diamond chicken! There's so much to do in the life of a farmer!

- Clean your animals when they get muddy
- A wide variety of new farm animal textures
- A farm shop, grocery shop, tavern, and villagers await in the local town
- Multiplayer ready!
- Achievements enabled!

projects.title: Monsters
projects.description:
These monsters are looking spooky with their sharp horns! Lurk in the shadows and scare your friends this Halloween season!

- 8 skins!
- Different monster designs so you can pick the skin that suits you best!

projects.title: Secret Acid Base
projects.description:
This secret acid base holds high-tech security features, resource generators and so much more!

+ Security camera system
+ Automatic mining drill
+ Acid islands to explore
+ Secret entrance, automatic farms, control center, and security doors

projects.title: One Block Lucky Block
projects.description:
One Block and lucky block come together and now you must try to survive!
Mine for necessary resources where lucky blocks randomly appear! 
Try your luck, have fun and survive!


+ Original and advanced modes!
+ Random chance for lucky blocks!
+ Try advanced mode where new islands spawn!
+ Exciting and crazy survival experience!

projects.title: Welcome to University
projects.description:
Ever wondered how daily life at university is? Then, welcome to the campus. Enjoy the facilities, but don't tire yourself, classes start early!
- Explore this realistic rendition of a university
- Find useful loot for your adventure
- Multiplayer ready! Play alone or with friends
- A stressful study plan turned students into monsters. Beware!

projects.title: Black & White Style
projects.description:
These teens are in black and white, but have bright splashes of color! Show off the manga look, and jump right off the page!

- 8 skins!
- Features a variety of designs and outfits so you can pick the one that suits you best!

projects.title: Arcane Travellers
projects.description:
The Arcane Travellers are on the move, grab your cloak and get ready for a journey!

- Disguise yourself with a mask or an assortment of different mysterious outfits
- Be a rogue in the darkness, a ninja in the shadows or a jester in disguise
- By Razzleberries

projects.title: Drakencrown Fortress
projects.description:
The drakenkind were expelled from the surface and survived for centuries in this underground bastion. Are you ready to delve into the unknown depths?
- Action-packed, highly detailed fantasy world
- Massive buildings and epic architecture
- Kick-start your adventure with nice loot
- Fight the monsters plaguing this sacred lands
- Multiplayer ready!

projects.title: Hitting the Gym
projects.description:
Do you want to be more athletic, perform better at sports, build up muscle, become a model, make new friends, or embrace a healthier lifestyle? If the answer to any of these is yes, then it's time to hit the gym!
- Fully equipped gym using custom models
- Detailed indoor environment
- Great for roleplay and multiplayer
- Create your own adventure

projects.title: Deadly Spawns: Desert Palace
projects.description:
Start your survival adventure in a gleaming palace besieged by foes! Explore the Desert Palace and its many treasures, but beware its new enemies!

- Discover custom mobs including Scorpions, Bandit Archers, Bandit Warriors, and the Royal Guard!
- Rule the desert realm and trade with neighboring villages!
- Achievements enabled!

projects.title: Waterfall Millionaire Mansion
projects.description:
Get yourself a beautiful mansion beside the majestic waterfall! Greet your mornings with energy as you inhale the fresh air before your epic adventure!

- Luxurious and huge mansion to explore!
- Fresh atmosphere to start your adventure!
- And much more

projects.title: Fantastic Hidden Base
projects.description:
Live in luxury and secrecy as no one will know where you live! A grass block like no other could open up and welcome you to your very own secret base!

+Close-able camouflage hatch!
+Live alone or with your friends!
+Hide from your friends!

And much more

projects.title: Micro Biomes
projects.description:
The search for the best place to create your home has concluded! The micro biomes are all yours to choose, just select your favorite spot and build!
- 700x700 block map centered in a survival world
- More than 18 custom biomes
- Scenic buildings and quick access to scarce construction blocks
- Fully multiplayer compatible! Bring your friends!

projects.title: Frogs
projects.description:
Frogs are invading your worlds! We love this little creature, but every swamp is overrun with them! 
Now, you can play as one of them or wear a fully fitted costume in this skin pack!

+ 1 free skin
+ 20 costume skins
+ 4 frog skins
+ Love to eat flies, no matter which skin you wear

projects.title: Epic Islands Crimsonwood
projects.description:
Play an epic survival island! Crimsonwood Island, home to small & unassuming little towns on top of a terrifying dangerous cave system inside the mountain. Can you free yourself from the outside world and make this survival island your home?

- Explore the cave system inside the mountain.
- Discover all the villages and shipwrecks around the island.
- Multiplayer friendly!

projects.title: Creeper Factory
projects.description:
Your job at the Creeper Factory is dangerous and thankless, but someone has to do it. Move gunpowder deliveries through the factory, dodge creeper deliveries and most importantly, don't let anything explode!
- Classic retro arcade style level.
- Try to beat your high score!
- A singleplayer challenge like no other.
- Can you find the hidden break room key?

projects.title: Crime-Craft
projects.description:
These criminals have broken free and need to be stopped at all costs! Put on a police uniform and take care of these escapees, or gear up as one of the robbers!

- Different prisoner outfit designs

- Includes a heavily armored S.W.A.T officer skin.

projects.title: Extreme Survival: Island

On a deserted island with no land in sight, you’ll have to survive storms and thrive off the little island's offerings. Beware! You can’t wander far! Swim in the reef, search caverns and make it your own! Can you survive?

+ Caverns and spawner dungeons!
+ Custom terrain!
+ Hidden chests to loot!
+ And more!

projects.title: 10Minutes vs 10Hours vs 10Days
projects.description:
Will you travel to a humble home thrown together in 10 minutes? A mansion that built 10 hours? Or the home desired by billionaires?
Who will be the lucky one to claim the house that takes 10 full days to create accompanied by a jet-ski and 3 supercars?!

- Jet-ski and 3 supercars!
- And much more!

projects.title: Superheroes!
projects.description:
A super-powered skinpack full of heroes! Includes a free skin!

+ 14 different skins!
+ 7 skin themes!
+ Luminosity, Shadow, Inferno, Glacial styles and more!

projects.title: 100 Days Skyblock
projects.description:
100 Days Skyblock! Unlock new Skyblock islands each day and reach day 100!

+ Quick play, normal and hardcore modes
+ Unique islands
+ Challenging survival experience

projects.title: Elven Sanctuary
projects.description:
Visit the place heard of only in fairy tales: Elven Sanctuary.
Take your mythical journey and wander into this haven! Settle down and become part of the myth.

- A majestic land for you to explore!
- Experience the wonders alone or with your friends!

projects.title: Private Hill Mansion

+ Fun backyard for activities!
+ Relax outdoors!

projects.title: Private Millionaire Island
projects.description:
Ever wonder what it feels like to have your very own private island? Travel into the world and live like a millionaire!

- private outdoor activities!
- Live alone or with your friends!

And much more!

projects.title: Mega Ultimate House

+PvP arena underground!

If you loved our Classic Skyblock map, you will love the challenge of Realistic Skyblock! Start on a realistic version of a Skyblock island, then branch out to the other biomes!

After an accident in a fossil lab, a historical time monster frees itself from the depths of the ocean. This prehistoric deep sea creature is so big and strong, it could swallow an entire submarine. Do you dare dive deep and find the lab? Be prepared to face off this ancient monster of epic proportions.

projects.title: Modern City
projects.description:
Take a step into the future! Live it up in this modern architectural marvel. A city filled with high-rise buildings boasting the best views overlooking the sea!

+ Private yachts.
+ Fully decorated interiors.

projects.title: Evil Masks
projects.description:

- 8 skins!
- Pick from a variety of masks and find the one that suits you best!

projects.title: Anime Ninjas
projects.description:
Embark on your epic 'Anime Ninjas' adventure!
Become a skilled master of stealth completing secret missions or stage awesome battles with your friends!

projects.title: Egyptian Oasis

Discover the wonders of the Egyptian civilization! Explore this colorful oasis in the middle of the desert, make it your new home and find all its secrets!

projects.title: Robot Teens

projects.title: Survival Island
projects.description:
Stranded alone with barely enough washed-up resources to survive, put your skills to the test and see if you can make it through another day!

+Hardcore survival!
+Create a place to call home once more!

And much more!

projects.title: Block Camo! 3
projects.description:
Camouflage yourself in any environment with this third installment of the block camo skin packs!
Disappear like a chameleon and creep up on your friends!

+ 12 HD Skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes glowstone, mycelium and obsidian camo and more!

projects.title: Creepers!
projects.description:
These Creepers have transformed into diverse elemental creepers!
Battle it out with your friends to find the strongest creeper!

projects.title: Capybaras 2

Capybaras are back pulling up into your world with more funny skins to meme with!

+ 1 free skin!

projects.title: Festive Slimes
projects.description:
The festive slimes have broken free and in the lab and are ready to get festive! Run rampant with your friends as one of the gooey pranksters or suit up as Santa himself!

projects.title: One Block Teens!
projects.description:
Dress up in cool themed clothing or even become a one block!

+ 12 HD skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes stylish block skins!

A huge disaster fell upon the world, covering it with water.

Will you be able to survive and have a place to call home once more?

-Survive with barely anything!
-Create a place to call home once more!
-Hardcore survival

projects.title: Blocks in Suits

With 11 different skins, these blocks mean business! Wearing their new suits, these block heads are ready for anything! Impress everyone, or spy on some noobs with a perfectly camouflaged head!

This pack includes the following skins:

- TNT
- Glass
- Chest
- Bee Nest
- Redstone Block
- Emerald Ore
- Emerald Block
- Diamond Ore
- Diamond Block
- Grass Block
- Dirt Block

Imagine driving a luxury car, or cruising on a cool motorcycle. Ever wanted to drive an ambulance, a school bus or maybe a police car? Now you can! There's monster trucks, limos, foodtrucks, you name it. We got it all in Car City!

These teens are going to be the talk of their high school with their brand new pastel clothes! From cool, faded shoes to cute and colorful blazers, these will make very popular school uniforms!

projects.title: Extreme Survival: Cube Planets

+ Custom discoverable houses!
+ And more!

A group of teens is missing and the investigation brings you to a mansion that sends shivers down your spine. You feel the evil within. Are you brave enough to solve the mystery?

These creepy zombies are back from the dead and mean business! They might have been spies, or pros of the professional world, but now they're a hoard of scary undead in suits and they're ready for anything!

Why wear a costume when you can wear a suit?

projects.title: Millionaire Vacation Villa

projects.title: Town of Tarlem

A town forgotten in time. Some say werewolves used to live in this town, but left it for unknown reasons. Maybe you can bring new life to this forgotten place?

+ Functional survival features.

The villagers have made a terrible mistake! They need your help to contain the outbreak! Fight off waves of mutated monsters with unique behaviors in this mini-game using fun weapons, tools and upgrades.

+Every single continent for you to explore

Submerge yourself into this epic and mysterious Valkyrie Valley, surrounded by the great houses of the ruthless Viking rulers and protected by the tree of the world.

In this huge town the City Police keep people safe. A robbery? Riots in the streets? A citizen in danger? The cops save the day! Enroll now and start your adventure as an officer!

With these 8 new skins, change yourself into your favorite mobs and live their adventures as if they were yours. After all the only limit is your imagination!\r\n\r\n~Includes 8 skins

Multiplayer friendly

projects.title: The Backrooms Camo

projects.title: RGB Gamers!

+ 1 free skin!

projects.title: Anthem Steampunk Fantasy

- Strider 
- Cold Strider

- Magma Cube

These creepy looking vampires are lurking in the shadows! With their sharp new suits, it's hard to deny how good they look!

- 10 skins!

projects.title: Jukebox Head

Working as a forest guard you hear strange noises coming from deep within the woods...

You must find a way to escape Jukebox Head!

+ Randomized scenarios!

projects.title: Pink Life!

Pink is on trend so dress to impress your friends!

Have you always dreamt of living in a little village in a GIANT tree? Then this survival spawn is just for you. You get the chance to kick start your survival adventure in a fantastical magical village in the trees!
