projects.title: TNT Engineers
projects.description:
The tests don't seem to go very well... But it's not a big deal! Join the scientists and engineers studying explosives, the teenagers carrying all kinds of TNT and have fun throwing them between your friends! The games will be explosive! The TNT Engineers skin pack is for you!

+ 10 HD skins
+ 1 free skin

projects.title: Endless Night
projects.description:
Become the hero the world needs! Defeat the freely roaming monsters and slay the monstrous dragon!
Bring back the peaceful days where the warm sun shone upon the world.

-Epic monster fights!
-Unlock the daylight!
-Become a glorious hero!
-Expand your dome!

projects.title: Deepbreath Valley
projects.description:
A deep gash in the terrain harbors thriving life. Lush vegetation, happy animals and amicable villagers live peacefully in the heart of the earth.
- Featuring highly detailed, immersive scenery with many structures
- Fight enemies, get loot, and trade with villagers
- Quick access to huge ore veins: a miner's paradise
- Enjoy the adventure alone or with friends

projects.title: One Block Tycoon
projects.description:
One Block Tycoon! Earn points, expand your island, and upgrade all the islands to maximize their true potential!

+Acquire points for upgrades!
+Upgrade your islands to increase their production!
+ 9 islands with 3 upgrades each! 27 in total.

And much more!

projects.title: Fashion Monsters
projects.description:
Meet the Fashion Monsters! Show off your fun side with these colourful skins.

-These unique Japanese inspired monsters are dressed head to toe in swag
-Become a Hype "Beast" in a literal sense!

projects.title: Fantastic Cliffside Base
projects.description:
Enjoy your relaxing stay with the fantastic view! Have a powerful rest and get ready for your next adventure!

+Refreshing survival base!
+Huge base to explore!
+Fully-furnished base!
+Peaceful and refreshing atmosphere!

And much more!

projects.title: Dinosaur Skyblock
projects.description:
Do you love playing survival but want something different? Look no further with this custom built dinosaur skyblock, with flyable dinosaurs that come in 12 colors. 

- Four prehistoric Minecraft skins!
- Over 20 hand-built floating sky islands!
- A Pterodactyl pet that you can tame and fly!
- Custom cave paintings!

projects.title: Baby Dragons
projects.description:
Are you ready for an adorable adventure? Hop into a world of cuteness and wonders! Hatch, raise and train your very own adorable baby dragon.

+ Play & interact with your baby dragons!
+ Ride & travel the world with your cute scaly friends!

projects.title: Gingerbread Village
projects.description:
A place with an enchanting Christmas spirit. The entire village made out of gingerbread and sweets! The perfect start to a magical adventure!

+ 8 unique holiday skins!
+ Cozy Christmas themed village
+ Houses made out of gingerbread
+ And much more!

projects.title: Horned Teens
projects.description:
With their pointy horns, and brand new outfits, these teens are ready to cause some trouble!

- 8 demon skins!
- From fancy suits to cool hoodies, you can pick the perfect skin for you!

projects.title: Cartoon Mobs
projects.description:
Dress up as your favorite Cartoon Mob! 

Ever thought; "Perhaps mobs could look... friendlier."? Well today is that day! Be the change you want to see and put on a cartoony skin that shows your mob friends in a cheerier light. 

+ 8 mob-themed skins.
+ Perfect for roleplay!

projects.title: OP WAND
projects.description: "OP Wand"! The ultimate wizarding battle experience. Players wield incredibly powerful wands and cast spells in fast-paced battles to become champion. \r\nMaster unique wands and battle in the arena. Climb the ranks and prove yourself as the greatest wizard. Play now!

projects.title: Billionaire Vacation Island
projects.description:
Live like a billionaire on your billion-dollar vacation island! Invite your friends to your island and create the best vacation experience ever!

+Huge mansion to explore!
+Outdoor activities!
+Invite your friends to your vacation island!

And much more

projects.title: Skyblock
projects.description:
UPDATED - The one and only Skyblock experience, now with 9 unlockable themed levels! Explore the Classic mode to unlock the Desert, Snow, Mesa, Nether, Steampunk, Rainbow, Basalt, Cliff and Cave Skyblocks.

+ New Caves & Cliff Skyblock Islands!
+ 5 Years anniversary Skyblock world!
+ Classic mode with many biomes!
+ Central hub for easy travel between worlds!
+ And more!

projects.title: Ore Camo!
projects.description:
Camouflage yourself in all types of ore with these awesome camo skins!
Play an epic game of hide and seek with your friends!

+ 8 HD camos!
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes gold ore, redstone, emerald ore camo and more!

projects.title: Dogs
projects.description: Hey! Look at those cuties! They're good boys! All they're waiting for is an owner to pick them up and have some fun! Get one of these puppies available in the Dogs skin pack!\r\n\r\n+ 13 skins

projects.title: Fantasy-Craft
projects.description:
From high elves to dark elves, orcs to humans... Fantasy-Craft is the ultimate high-fantasy skin pack! Fill an RPG role, and pick from a variety of classic fantasy races!

- Be a hunter, rogue, warrior, mage, or something entirely different
- Represent the Imperials as one of their soldiers, or be an orc warrior from the feared wandering horde!
- Free bonus skin! Gratis!

projects.title: Mythos
projects.description:
Something is brewing atop Mount Olympus! Do you have what it takes to defeat the ancient beasts prowling Ancient Greece? Win glory - and loot! - from the gods and protect your city in MYTHOS!

- Single-player RPG!
- Custom resource pack and soundscapes!
- Six dynamic boss battles!

projects.title: Extreme Survival: Wasteland
projects.description:
In a small bunker buried deep in a barren wasteland, your journey will begin. Explore the world around you and find treasure, traps and more! Can you thrive in the extreme conditions?

- Custom terrain!
- Multiple explorable points of interest!
- Crashed airplane, factory, ferris wheel and more!
- Limited resources for added difficulty!

projects.title: FROGS+
projects.description:
A very aesthetic collection of frog-themed skins! Ideal for players who like to roleplay, want a good froggy look, or just like the color green! This pack offers a variety of frog themed skins to choose from! Which skin is your favorite? 

- 8 frog-themed skins. 
- Perfect for roleplay!

projects.title: NPCs
projects.description:
NPCs have been seen living out their lives around Minecraft...
Blend into the crowd and meme with your friends!

+ 12 NPCs skins!
+ 1 free skin!
+ Includes simple NPCs skins!

projects.title: Mob Superheroes!
projects.description:
The Mob Superheroes have swooped into Minecraft to save the day!
Become the heroic mob you were born to be with the coolest costumes and unique accessories!

+ 12 superhero mob skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes zombie, creeper and slime mob superhero skins!

projects.title: Doomsday Bunker
projects.description:
In the deep woods, lies a hatch that leads to a mysterious bunker! Open up the hatch and explore what this hidden stronghold has to offer! Customize, explore, and ultimately make this your safe house!

- Custom 3D modeled doomsday bunker hatch

projects.title: Derp Chin Challenge
projects.description:
Ever wanted to TROLL your friends in Minecraft? Everyone uses derp faces to act silly, but have you ever surprised them with it? Simply look up, and your face will become a DERP! Your friends will have no idea what happened, so take the challenge!

- 8 custom skins
- Silly styles

projects.title: Valentine Cakes
projects.description:
These cute bakers have been working very hard to prepare Valentine's Day... Everyone loves cakes, sweets, and treats!

- Each character is themed after a different cake.
- Colourful and perfect for roleplaying.

projects.title: Police vs Prison
projects.description:
What's life like when you're locked behind bars? Pitting Cops against Prisoners! Choose your side and have fun with your friends.

+ These skins are perfect for jailbreak role-playing games!
+ Will you be a cop or a thief?

projects.title: Elemental Teens
projects.description:
Choose your faction, and become an elemental warrior! With these skins you can hide in plain sight! Perfect camouflage for blending into nature!

- 4 elemental nations to choose from: Fire, ice, water, and nature

Which faction will you choose?

projects.title: Classic Skyblock
projects.description:
Everyone loves to play skyblock, and now you can enjoy the challenge for yourself in Classic Skyblock! Start with almost nothing, then grow and trade to eventually beat the Wither!

- Survive and expand!
- 7 islands to get loot and animals from!
- Fight the Wither!
- Multiplayer-friendly Minecraft Survival Spawn!

projects.title: Simple Spawns: Redwood Village
projects.description:
Get a kick-start on your survival adventures in this redwood village with larger-than-life trees! Walk through the towering forest, and admire its beauty from your new redwood town!

- Explore this custom crafted redwood village!
- Discover custom caves, and chop down mighty trees!
- Multiplayer friendly survival spawn!

projects.title: Hazmat Suits
projects.description:
Oh no, there is a toxic spill in the lab! Quick, stay safe put on your safety gear! Hazmat suits protect against radiation and any other dangerous materials, essential for any lab!

- 8 different skins!
- Perfect for any mad scientists!

projects.title: Anime School
projects.description:
With their classic school uniforms in order, these anime teens are ready to hit the books... Tuck in that shirt!

- 8 different skins!
- A wide variety of school uniform designs!
- Bright and colorful characters, find one that suits you!

projects.title: One Block Wide Challenge
projects.description:
Prepare yourself to face one of the most challenging maps out there! Survival in a one-block wide world! Are you ready for the challenge?

+One-block Overworld, Nether, and The End!
+Defeat the Ender Dragon on a one-block platform

projects.title: Run Lucky Block
projects.description:
Compete against your friends and see who can climb to the top first! Racers beware! Don't leave any lucky blocks behind or you won't win the game! Are you up for the challenge?

+ More than 10 different races.
+ Single or multiplayer!
+ Randomized lucky block loot!

projects.title: Nether Pros!
projects.description:
The Nether Pros have arrived equipped with netherite armour ready to explore the Nether and encounter piglins, striders and many more! 
Explore the latest Warped forest, Crimson Forest and Soulsand Valley with these epic nether pro skins!

+ 16 HD pros!
+ 2 free SD skins
+ Includes zombiefied piglin, baby strider and baby piglin skins!

projects.title: Hello Kitty and Friends
projects.description: Step into Hello Kitty's® world in this sweet DLC! Build a cozy farm, grow crops, and raise animals with Hello Kitty and Friends. Upgrade your house with cute new furniture and enjoy fun seasonal events like egg hunts and pumpkin carving!

projects.title: Magic Skies Forest
projects.description:
Take your mining and crafting to the skies in this forest-themed skyblock world of magical floating islands! Venture your way through the floating forest, explore its secrets and caves, collect resources on the different islands and survive!

-Peaceful forest environment.
-Collect loot on various islands.
-Enjoy exploring on your own or with friends!

projects.title: Mob Reapers!
projects.description:
The old and spooky Mob Reapers have been haunting Minecraft!
Pay your friends a scary visit and collect their souls!

+ 12 Mob Reapers skins!
+ 1 free skin!
+ Includes creeper, zombie, and axolotl reapers!

projects.title: Dark Knights
projects.description:
These knights have been through deadly adventures and have lived to tell the tale! Be ready for anything Minecraft throws at you!

- 10 skins!
- Wide variety of armor designs so you can pick the ideal skin for you!

projects.title: Millionaire Summer Vacation
projects.description:
Escape to a luxury destination this summer! Live in this beach-side mansion, enjoy its breathtaking ocean views, and make unforgettable memories with friends and family.

+Millionaire mansion & island to explore!
+Take in the beautiful view from your own private observation deck!

projects.title: Simple Spawns: Forest Fortress
projects.description:
Start your journey into the vast world of Minecraft in this woodland outpost! Explore the town and make it your own!

- Explore the strong forest fortress!
- Upgrade the fort and defend the forest!
- Multiplayer friendly survival spawn!

projects.title: Amethyst Tools
projects.description:
Amethyst Tools adds a new full toolset made out of amethysts to the game.

-Full new tool-set & weapons
-Unique medieval castle and dungeon
-Custom villages

projects.title: Festive's Fir Trees
projects.description: Oh? What's going on? Living and partying fir trees? No, you're not dreaming! Take advantage of this beautiful pack full of joy and happiness by embodying one of these festive fir trees!\r\n\r\n+ 15 skins

projects.title: Haunted Mansion
projects.description:
Those living around the Haunted Mansion fled long ago. Its evil atmosphere oozes spookiness! Do you have what it takes to enter this enchanted house?
-5 fully customized, bone-chilling ghosts
-Superb hair-rising architecture
-Eerie atmosphere with weird sounds
-Cursed treasure and loot all over the place
-Too scared to walk alone? Bring your friends

projects.title: Forgotten Hyperport
projects.description:
An outlaw’s favorite space port. Hidden among the stars, most illegal activities start in this very place. Watch out, you might get in trouble!
- Action-packed, highly detailed sci-fi world
- Massive buildings and epic architecture
- Survive hordes of enemies and collect valuable loot
-Lonely? Use your companion support drone or bring friends!

projects.title: Cursed Mobs!
projects.description:
Cursed Mobs have been flipped on their sides in this crazy and funny skin pack!
Joke around with your friends and make them laugh with Cursed Mobs!

+ 12 Cursed Mob skins!
+ 1 free skin!
+ Includes creeper, zombie and axolotl Cursed Mob skins!

projects.title: Gaming Infection
projects.description:
These teens have undergone a transformation. An infection is spreading throughout their bodies, turning them into the perfect professional gamers. Now they're unstoppable.

- 8 infection-themed skins!
- Perfect for roleplay!

projects.title: Teens in Fame
projects.description:
Flashing lights, big city, and fame! Get ready to be one of the most famous teens in the city. You can be a movie star, singer or either whatever you want. Just dress up and show up in your mansion with your friends.

- 10 skins
- by Withercore

projects.title: The Road Less Travelled
projects.description:
An ever-changing forest. Mysterious spirits. A road like no other.
Take a relaxing walk down a path that's never the same twice! Collect items,
build in a forest glade, chat with spirits, and meet fellow forest travellers.

- Requires a minimum chunk render distance of 12.
- Procedurally generated path to explore - no trip is the same!
- Build in a peaceful glade!

projects.title: Temple of Poseidon
projects.description:
Pick up the trident! Explore the old Temple of Poseidon, where the drowned men roam!
- A giant temple to explore!
- Numerous enemies to fight!
- Defeat the drowned
- Make the temple your home!

projects.title: Roleplay: High School
projects.description:
Friends, drama, maybe even... love? You can have it all happen in Roleplay: High School! We set the scene with a cool high school building for all your roleplay needs.

-Get back to school and play the part of a student.
-Have fun with friends.
-Live out your social high school life!

projects.title: Dogs with Jobs
projects.description:
Jolly barbers! Cheeky merchants! How will you shape this bizarre, but fluffy canine society?
- 15 probably certified dogs! 
- Share your profession with a buddy with an extra set of recolored skins! (That's 30 skins total!)
- You can have the lazy pugs... they're free. 

Professionally trained by ViviSpook

projects.title: The Great Oasis
projects.description:
These lands hide a great secret; a beautiful golden city in a hidden desert oasis. The ruler of the palace has disappeared but left behind valuable treasures and loot, waiting to be found. What are you waiting for? It's yours for the taking.

-Survival map
-Hidden treasures
-Secrets to explore

projects.title: Secret Bed Base
projects.description:
Under your bed lies your actual base! Lift up your bed and welcome yourself to your ultimate secret base! Explore new rooms and live in the luxurious secret base!

+Open/close-able bed!
+Secret base!
+Huge base to explore!
+Fun activities!

And much more

projects.title: Beach Bonfire
projects.description:
Spending a week at the beach with your aunt was supposed to be relaxing! Instead, she's throwing a party on the beach at the end of the week and told you to invite the entire village! 
- Speak to 9 colourful villagers with branching dialog & convince them to join you 
- A beautiful town that changes appearance every day!
- Can you find all the secrets?

projects.title: Mobs in Pajamas
projects.description:
The sky is full of stars, so it's time to get cozy! Put down the blocks and grab some hot chocolate. These cute mobs are in their pajamas and ready for bed!

This skin pack includes the following comfy mob skins:

- Creeper
- Enderman
- Zombie
- Zombie Pigman
- Skeleton
- Spider
- Ghast
- Slime

projects.title: Temple of Peace
projects.description: Rest and relax in this ancient temple made for tranquility! After a long day’s journey, you can come back to the sanctum taken by time and overgrown with vegetation. So hang up your armor, and fish in the vast underground lake!

projects.title: Rublocks Cube Challenge
projects.description:
Introducing one of the hardest games you've ever played: Rublocks! Find the missing pieces to complete the central cube. Each of the 26 cubes have their own challenges for you to overcome! You'll need to think quickly to complete this nearly impossible game!

-Brand new challenges!
-Relax and build or dare to enter the scarier cubes!

projects.title: Aymara
projects.description:
Thousands of years ago, the land was a thriving port. Now lost in the sands of time, can you recover the lost city of Aymara?
-Explore the city and the temple of the phoenix.
-Find loot hidden all around the city.
-Roleplay as king or queen in your new land.

projects.title: Mob Cops & Robbers!
projects.description:
Mob Cops & Robbers are battling it out in the world of Minecraft!
Fight for justice as a mob on the side of the law or wreak havoc as a robber!

+ 10 HD skins!
+ 1 free HD skin!
+ Includes lots of different mob skins!

projects.title: Enderman Teens!
projects.description:
Upgrade your wardrobe with these vibrant and cool Enderman Teens skins!
Impress your friends with clothing inspired by the Enderman of Minecraft! 

+ 12 HD skins!
+ 1 free HD skin!
+ Includes Enderman teen boy and girl skins!

projects.title: RV Summer
projects.description:
Go on an epic RV trip to discover more of the world!
Drive the sweeping American highways with your friends!

+ 10 HD skins!
+ 1 free skin
+ Includes RV, highway and mountain skins!

projects.title: Biome Box
projects.description:
The world's biomes have been stuffed into 12 different boxes! Cast away the monsters who wait inside and make them your home. Choose to stay in one box and work with one biome's loot, or break out and expand into multiple boxes!

-12 unique boxes!
-Conquer all the challenges each box contains!
-Explore what each box has in store!

projects.title: Skull Teens
projects.description:
Woah, spooky! These teens are dressed up in bright neon gear and are all wearing skull masks! I wonder what they're up to?

- 8 intense skeleton-themed skins!
- Wide variety of colors and styles, find the perfect skin that suits you!

projects.title: Pros VS Hackers
projects.description:
Glowing high-tech power armor pros take on vibrant and mysterious masked hackers!
Back the pros or join the team of hackers with this awesome skin pack! 

+ 12 skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes power armor pros and masked hackers!

projects.title: Extreme Survival: Raft
projects.description:
Row your raft along the sea and venture islands filled with treasures and caves full of wonders!

+ Controllable raft!
+ Multiple explorable islands!
+ Multiple hidden treasure chests with loot!
+ Hidden caves!
+ And more!

projects.title: Emoji Heads
projects.description:
Express yourself with these crazy emoji faces, all in HD!

- 20 unique and colorful skins to choose from!
- A variety of different emojis from happy to angry!
- These emoticon skins are perfect if you want to show your mood.

projects.title: One Chunk Challenge 2
projects.description:
Are you ready to face the hardships of the whole world?
Survive the challenge of a regular world, except, the whole world is contained in one single chunk!
Will you be able to get past every level and finish the whole game?

-Challenging gameplay
-Packed with challenges on every level!
-Defeat the Ender Dragon & Wither in a one chunk dimension!

projects.title: Portal to Millionaire Island
projects.description:
An unusual portal in rainbow colors... Where does this portal go?
A millionaire's island! Pass through the magical portal and have your dreams come true!

+3 super-cars and jet-ski!
+Huge millionaire's island to explore!
+Indoor and outdoor activities!

And much more

projects.title: Millionaires
projects.description:
These millionaires are living a life of glamour and luxury! From mansions to top tier sports cars, they're living the life!

- 8 skins!
- Pick from a wide variety of skin designs and outfits! 

Which one suits you best?

projects.title: Vintage Teens
projects.description: Dress up in the top vintage fashions of the last century and make them current again! Plaid skirts, overalls, tracksuits and jackets, what will fit you the best? \r\n+ 10 diverse vintage skins included!

projects.title: TNT Zombie Blast
projects.description:
Test your aim in this zombie filled mini-game with 18 levels, 2 different themes and 2 boss levels!

+ Multiple custom weapons!
+ Increasing difficulty!
+ Replay levels once unlocked!
+ Practice area to test weapons!
+ And more!

projects.title: Dark Horrors
projects.description:
Dark Horrors have been sighted lurking in the darkness of Minecraft...
Set up jump scares and terrify your friends with creepy white faces and hollow black eyes! 

+ 8 HD skins!
+ 1 free HD skin!
+ Includes black and white skins with green neon details!

projects.title: Block Camo!
projects.description:
Hide in any situation with this block camo skin pack! Includes free "Grass Camo" skin! Grab the pack and start sneaking!
+ 12 different camos!
+ HD facial features!
+ Portal, lava, water, leaf, cactus and more!

projects.title: MC But: Water Burns
projects.description:
It's a survival world but... rain and water really really hurt! Try this new next-level mode for a refreshing take on survival mode, starting out in a beautiful fishing village.
- New mechanic!
- Use potions to survive in water!
- Challenging new game mode.
- Multiplayer friendly!

projects.title: Creeper Fashion
projects.description:
These teens love Creepers and are suited up with the latest in fashion trends! TNT and explosions not included!

- 8 skins included!
- Display the iconic exploding friend in on your clothes!
- Wide variety of casual clothes, including hoodies, sneakers, t-shirts and more!

projects.title: Brawlyn Castle
projects.description:
Brawlyn Castle is elegant and inviting. Built on the side of the mountains. It overlooks rivers, valleys and its own modest yet lovely castle town.

+ Walk the castle halls and discover its secrets.
+ Enjoy your time in the quiet Brawlyn Village.
+ Single or Multiplayer experience.

projects.title: Icy Trends
projects.description:
Bring some frosty monster looks into your world! Transform yourself with these stunning ice-themed designs. Create a chilling atmosphere and become cool as ice.

- Includes 10 blue hued skins. 
Have fun out there!

projects.title: TNT Camo!
projects.description:
Battle with your friends with this TNT Camo pack!
Have a blast with these explosive camos!

+ 8 HD skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes nuclear, rainbow and creeper TNT camos!

projects.title: Back To School
projects.description: The vacations are unfortunately over, we have to go back to school, but look on the bright side! Join your friends and learn together with the characters of the Back To School skin pack!\r\n\r\n- 15 skins

projects.title: Space Aliens
projects.description:
Scary space aliens from far off in the cosmos have arrived in Minecraft!
Join the invasion and role-play as creepy, otherworldly beings. 
Ranging from tentacled monstrosities, skeleton-like creatures and powerful armoured invaders.

+ 12 HD Skins
+ Includes 1 free skin!
+ Colorful and creepy alien creatures!

projects.title: Noob vs Pro
projects.description:
Move your survival experience underground where you're safe and hidden!
Choose whether you want to live in a base built in 10 seconds or a millionaire's base built in more than 100 hours!

- Hide from your friends & survive!
- Live like a millionaire underground!
- Lots of fun for you to explore!

projects.title: Axolotls And Pajamas
projects.description:
Axolotls are cute and we love them. Axolotls in pajamas, we love them even more! 
Adopt each one of them, they are numerous and they are waiting for you! 
So try the skin pack Axolotls and Pajamas
- Cute and unique Axolotl skins
- 2 wonderful free skins
- 64 gorgeous skins

projects.title: Simple Spawns: North Pole
projects.description:
Welcome to an arctic expedition. It’s cold and dangerous, but hang in there. Hidden treasure awaits under a mountain of ice for those brave enough to go looking.

+ Ancient unexplored ruins filled with loot.
+ Cool arctic dig site facilities.
+ Breathtaking mountaintop views and adventures.

projects.title: Secret Volcano Base
projects.description:
Deep within the heart of a volcano, this secret base contains advanced technology, lava dragons, and lots more to discover... all kept hidden from the world above.

+ Huge secret volcano base
+ Control panel
+ Escape hatch
+ Lucky Lava Dragon

projects.title: Troll Parkour
projects.description:
The world’s most evil minds have crafted the wickedest troll parkour around. Avoid the traps and become the one and only untrollable player!
- 25 challenges with unique scenery
- All kinds of mechanics, traps, and surprises
- Die, learn, and improve!
- Stuck? Use the special aid tool and skip up to 5 levels
- Demonstrate your skill and remain untrolled!

projects.title: Middle Ages
projects.description:
The Middle Ages skin pack throws you right back to the dark age of feudalism, whether you need an outfit to suit your castle life or need to don your hunting gear.

Play as a knight, king, noble, monk, jester, merchant or hunter
Fulfill your medieval fantasy, from being the joker of a court, to the ruler of an empire

projects.title: Luxury Beachside Mansion
projects.description:
Take a deep breath as you feast your eyes upon the beautiful beach-side view right from your luxurious beach-side mansion!

+ Gorgeous mansion to explore!
+ Modern design!
+ Private beach!
+ Invite your friends for a beach party!

projects.title: Millionaire Cliffside Mansion
projects.description:
A grand and luxurious mansion right above the sea for those who adore beautiful views! Live in a millionaire's mansion as it is yours to live in!

+Huge millionaire's mansion to explore!
+Immersive views to enjoy!
+Refreshing atmosphere

projects.title: Wool Camo
projects.description:
Wool Camo has arrived with vibrant wool colors and stylish clothing designs!
Camouflage yourself, hide, and surprise your friends!

+ 10 Camo skins
+ 1 free skin
+ Includes colorful Wool Camo skins

projects.title: Earth Guardians
projects.description:
These Elementals are at Mother Nature's command! As spirits of the planet, it's their job to protect the wilderness.

There are 6 different HD skins to pick from:

- Water
- Nature
- Fire
- Earth
- Cloud
- Ice

Which element will you choose?

projects.title: Mythical Gods!
projects.description:
The Mythical Gods have arrived in Minecraft with glowing white eyes!
Become a super-powerful god and bring destruction or save the world!

+ 12 Mythical Gods skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes male and female Mythical Gods skins!

projects.title: Simple Spawns: Desert Temple
projects.description:
Discover a forgotten desert temple and town surrounding a remote oasis! Raid and loot the temple, and reclaim the village!

- Explore the dungeon and battle mobs!
- Pick a house and make it your home!
- Multiplayer-friendly Minecraft Survival Spawn!

projects.title: Mob Food!
projects.description:
Delicious Mob Food has been cooking in Minecraft!
Grab a snack with this mouth-watering and creative skin pack!

+ 12 Mob Food skins!
+ 1 free skin!
+ Includes creeper, zombie, and axolotl Mob Food skins!

projects.title: Summer Break Mansion
projects.description:
Welcome to your summer paradise! This fancy and luxury filled mansion offers a stunning ocean view, sparkling swimming pool, private beach, and outdoor activities. Host summer gatherings and make memories that last a lifetime.

+Your very own mansion to explore!
+Party in the summer everyday!

projects.title: Omega Castle
projects.description:
Welcome to your new epic Minecraft adventure! Rule the world from your huge palace!

-Gigantic fantasy castle!
-Houses around the castle!
-Omega Portal in the middle of the ocean

projects.title: Billionaire Mobs
projects.description:
Billionaire Mobs are living the high life!
Impress your friends as a mob in luxury robes decorated in gold and unique jewelry! 

+ 12 Billonaire skins!
+ 1 free skin!
+ Includes rich Billionaire Mob skins!

projects.title: Lucky Skyblock
projects.description:
Sky Block and Lucky Blocks are a match made in heaven! Play the classic sky island survival experience with 6 custom islands and 6 respawning lucky blocks!
-Open lucky blocks for treats to build your world.

projects.title: 100 Days Cube Planets
projects.description:
100 Days Cube Planets has arrived with many vibrant planets to explore! Survive 100 days by exploring each unique planet!
Adventure around the planets discovering secrets and resources to survive!

+ Quick play, normal and hardcore modes!
+ New cube planets spawn for every day survived!
+ Quick play for a fast and fun experience!
+ Hardcore mode survive with 1 life!

projects.title: Hidden Ninja Village
projects.description:
Ohayo welcome to the mysterious land of pagodas!
You have an amazing opportunity to meet the cutest local animals, and play with them!
Moreover, everything here has been arranged in the picturesque scenery of a giant coniferous forest.

-Unravel traditional village’s secrets, 
-Discover new animal species
-Find precious treasures!
-There’s so much to do!
- 2 skins included

projects.title: Roleplay: Big City
projects.description:
Roam free in the big city! Skyscrapers surround you. As high as the eye can see! Fashion, drama, partying, money... you want it? You got it. Jump into the city vibes and lead the life you want!

- Dozens of fully furnished skyscrapers.
- Visit fancy restaurants and the mall.
- The perfect urban map for roleplay.

projects.title: Extreme Survival: Mob Heads
projects.description:
Explore inside many of your favorite mob heads from a creeper to an enderman! 
Find your way inside and discover massive unique environments and loot!


+ Various explorable mob heads!
+ Vibrant environments and dungeons!
+ Hidden chests with loot! 
+ Unique and fun survival experience!

projects.title: Noob vs Pro Ultimate Base
projects.description:
Ease your mind as your base is totally secured! High-tech security measures under your control to keep your base safe from any unwanted visitors!

- Working security cameras!
- Working laser gates!
- Working lift!
- Huge base to explore!

And much more!

projects.title: Pros!
projects.description:
With this pack you can become the pro Minecraft player that you have always wanted to be! Decide if you want to be a Diamond Pro, Rainbow Pro or even a Fire Pro - the choice is yours!

+ 14 awesome skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Become the pro you have always wanted to be!

projects.title: Graphic-T Space
projects.description: Are you space crazy? Well now your outfit can let everyone know! Show the world your bright colours by dressing as the sun... or perhaps you're more of a moon person? Let everyone know with the Graphic-T Space pack!\r\n\r\nWhich planet will you choose?

projects.title: Cair Tilos Medieval Island
projects.description:
Welcome to Cair Tilos!
Explore this fortified island, take control of the castle, and reign over this Medieval Kingdom! Try to survive and conquer Minecraft!
-A fortified city, completely detailed!
-A castle overlooking the whole island!
-A commercial port!
-A unique survival spawn

projects.title: The Backrooms Noclip
projects.description:
The Backrooms Noclip skins have noclipped through reality into your world!
Camouflage into the Backrooms noclip environment with glitch skins!

+ 12 Backrooms skins
+ 1 free skin

projects.title: Beetle Grove
projects.description:
Hidden amidst the rotting trunks is a paradise for beetles and bugs! Discover a fantastic world ruled by fancy and amicable creepy-crawlies.
- Adventure in a wild forest ruled by bugs
- Huge, custom, natural area
- Exploration-oriented! Find hidden chests with loot!
- Fight for survival! Troublesome enemies galore!
- Multiplayer ready

projects.title: Hackers
projects.description:
Oh no! My computer has been hacked! Join this group of hackers by playing one of them and thus ravage everywhere you go!

+ 15 skins
+ Computer knowledge and experience

projects.title: Egg Trail
projects.description:
The celebration is here! In honor of Rabbitus, the giant rabbit sleeping in an egg, the people of Egglandia are throwing a party! Explore the island, find all the eggs hidden by the inhabitants and admire the start of the festival!

-Hunt for hidden eggs
-Visit the colorful villages
-Keep an eye out for cute pastel bunnies!
-Secret finale!

projects.title: Sky Bench
projects.description:
Survive on large themed block islands! Try to stay alive and don't fall down into the void! 

- Test your mettle in this unforgiving world
- Survive on low resources
- Explore the islands and collect loot and supplies!

projects.title: Simple Spawns: Wall Bunker
projects.description:
The land is in ruins. Buildings destroyed and roads wiped out. Who knows what disaster befell the region. What you do know is there is only one thing left standing. A bunker.

+ Post-apocalyptic urban ruins.
+ Plenty of rundown buildings and structures to scavenge for goods.
+ A mysterious bunker riddled with danger and valuables.

projects.title: Millionaire Diamond Mansion
projects.description:
Make yourself at home because the grand mansion and its luxurious display are all yours! Show your friends how many diamonds you have as you have more than enough!

+Huge millionaire's mansion to explore!
+Live like royalty!
+Supercars!

And much more!

projects.title: Cookie Creations!
projects.description:
Pick up this delicious Cookie Creations pack with various sizes and funny expressions!
Dress up as a cool cookie and have a sweet time with your friends!

+ 12 Cookie Creations skins
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes smiley, laughing, and angry cookie skins!

projects.title: Snowball Blast
projects.description:
Get ready for a high-speed winter experience! Zoom through snowy trails on a sled. Blast some snowmen with snowballs, get points, unlock all the levels!

- Customize your sled.
- 10 winter-themed stages.
- 4 skins included!

projects.title: Modern City
projects.description:
It's time to explore the city, decorate your house and drive all around! Have fun with your friends in this amazing modern city with luxurious cars, the most expensive furnishings and the most beautiful mansions!

+ Includes 5 skins. 
+ More than 70 different decorative items to customize your city! 
+ Functional vehicles!

projects.title: UFOs
projects.description:
Go forth earthling! On a UFO hunting adventure with the help of the alien rebel Yummu. Search for and salvage three missing UFOs that crash-landed on your farm! Engage in thrilling battles with aliens. Uncover their secrets, save the day!

+ Collect 3 UFOs (spaceships!)
+ Waves of Alien to fight!

projects.title: Paradise Island
projects.description:
Once the home of pirates and outlaws, Paradise Island is now littered with the treasures they left behind. Explore mysterious forests, redecorate an abandoned village, commandeer pirate ships, and more! And for the braver adventurers, great secrets (and even greater treasures) lie inside the island's ancient temple.

+5 explorer skins
+Created by Razzleberries and LeadPro

projects.title: Rainbow Teens
projects.description:
You like colors? Get rainbow skins to communicate your emotions to the world! Wear the colors of the rainbow and never have to choose what color to wear again!

+1 free skin
+ 10 rainbow skins

projects.title: Colorful Cuts
projects.description:
Colourful Cuts is here! Sport these stylish new haircuts straight out from the hair salon and show off your fashion sense. You'll be the talk among all your friends!
- Super stylish and cute!
- Show off the latest fashions with these skins
- Bright, colourful and cheery! 
- By Razzleberries

projects.title: Magic Skies Evergreen
projects.description:
Take your mining and crafting to the skies in an evergreen forest skyblock world. Venture your way through a magical floating forest, explore its secrets and caves, collect resources on the different islands and survive! Will you become a master of the skies?

-Peaceful evergreen forest environment.
-Loot on different islands.
-Enjoy exploring on your own or with friends!

projects.title: Anime High School
projects.description:
Welcome to Anime High School, here you can choose from a variety of different Anime High School characters to role-play ranging from students to teachers all with their own unique expressions and outfit styles!

+ 12 HD skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Role-play as a Student or Teacher

projects.title: Haunted Manor
projects.description:
Welcome to this all-new and terrifying world. Complete with terrifying mobs that are sure to visit you in your nightmares. 

-Huge scary manor to explore. 
-4 brand new terrifying creatures. 
-Complete story with quests!

projects.title: Winter Carol
projects.description:
Sing a song in front of your fireplace! Gather round, sing a winter carol, read fairy tales, and cuddle with your friends and family!

- 8 unique skins!
- 1 FREE skin!
- Includes warm clothing even in the coldest snow!

projects.title: Sponges
projects.description:
Sponges can look cute and squishy or creepy and drippy. Pick your own unique spongy skin and absorb some new adventures together with your friends!

+ Squeeze out some roleplay!
+ Soak up everyone's attention!

projects.title: Mob Skeletons
projects.description:
Mob Skeletons have been spotted roaming the biomes of Minecraft!
Pick up this pack and discover the scary skeletons of some of your favorite mobs!


+ 10 HD Skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes creeper, zombie and spider skeletons!

projects.title: Tiny Village
projects.description:
Tucked away in the forest, you will find a tiny village. Fit for even the most outgoing small inhabitants. Come join in the adventure!
- 4 small custom homes!
- Large exporable open world!
- Chests with discoverable loot!
- Beautiful custom terrain!
- And more!

projects.title: World's Safest House
projects.description:
Getting tired of those creepers going inside your house? Or skeletons showing up and shooting arrows at you in your sleep? Fear not! In the world's safest house, there are multiple traps all around the house to protect you while you are at the comfort of your house.

+ Explorable base!
+ Various types of traps!
+ Multiple hidden treasure chests with loot!
+ And more!

projects.title: Noob vs Pro vs Legend
projects.description:
Become a noob, pro, or even a legend underwater! Find the right role for you, and experience the first ever Noob vs Pro vs Legend roleplay!

- Play alone or with your friends!

- Roleplay as a noob, pro, or even a legend!

- Have your wonderful home as a Noob, Pro or a Legend underwater!

- And much more!

projects.title: Haunted Island
projects.description:
Ghost hunter, we need your help! Skull Island is heavily haunted, and we need you to sail over there, capture all the ghosts, and free the island! Remember, you will need to hunt for clues to learn how to capture special ghosts!

- 7 custom ghost mobs
- 7 bonus skins included!
- Capture ghosts and teleport them back to the lab
- Spooky haunted mansion
- Multiplayer ready!

projects.title: Nether Camo!
projects.description:
Sneak around the Nether with this pack which includes all the brand new blocks from the Nether update!
Embark on a stealthy adventure around the Nether with your friends!

+ 19 HD skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes blue nylium, shroomlight and crying obsidian camo!

projects.title: Hidden Tree Base
projects.description:
Live in total secrecy as you live in plain sight under a single tree! 

+Camouflage tree!
+Hidden entrance!
+Open/close-able tree!
+Secret tree base for you to hide from or with your friends!
+Huge tree base to explore!
+Fun activities

projects.title: Skyblock Upside Down
projects.description:
A standard skyblock map where everything is completely normal... Oh wait, the whole world is upside down!

+ Standard skyblock with a twist!
+ Unique islands
+ Endless possibilities!
+ And more!

projects.title: Mansion Under House
projects.description:
Do not judge a book by its cover! What seems to be a small house has more to offer!
A huge mansion is right underneath your feet! Live in luxury mansion and hide from your friends!

-Huge hidden mansion!
-Hidden redstone entrance to easily enter the underground mansion!
-Live in a huge home without any of your friends know!
-And much more!

projects.title: Frogs!
projects.description:
Show your emotions with a variety of Frog skins!
Whether you are a happy, sad, or cool frog this pack has them all!

+ 12 HD skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes laughing, angry and tired frog skins!

projects.title: Scary Halloween Monsters
projects.description:
Oh no! Run away! Scary monsters and people are chasing us! This is no time to sleep. Play as one of the famous Halloween characters included in this skin pack!

- 15 skins
- Scary!

projects.title: Fantasy Life
projects.description:
Be an elf, orc, goblin, or even the rare triton! Have an adventure in Minecraft while playing as a fantasy character that suits you! 

- 8 skins!
- Inspired by classic role playing games!
- Pick from a wide selection of skin designs and choose one that represents you!

projects.title: Dungeon Skyblock
projects.description:
If you loved our Classic Skyblock map, you will love the challenge of Dungeon Skyblock! Start on a version of a Skyblock island with dungeons, then branch out to the other biomes!

- Survive and expand!
- 7 islands with spawners to get loot and animals from!
- Reach the Nether and the End!
- Multiplayer-friendly Minecraft Survival Spawn!

projects.title: Ultimate Hacker Client
projects.description:
Get your very own ULTIMATE hack client in Minecraft! X-Ray the ground and find all the ores! Walk through the sky with the platform hack! Never die against your friends with GOD-MODE again! And explore many other features!
+X-ray
+Fly
+Kill aura
+Speed hack
+Hacker tools
+Multiplayer friendly
These hacks are only available in this world and achievements are disabled.

projects.title: Magic Skies Mesa
projects.description:
Take your mining and crafting to the skies in this Mesa-themed skyblock world of magical floating islands! Hop on this adventure up high. Collect resources and watch your step! Become a master of the sky, one block at a time.

-Mesa themed floating islands
-Comfy with lots of loot.
-Play solo or multiplayer

projects.title: The Backrooms Exit
projects.description:
RUN! Run for your life!
Chase and scare your friends through the Exit level as a dark Backrooms entity!

+ 10 HD skins!
+ 1 free HD skin!
+ Includes striking Backrooms Exit skins!

projects.title: Cyber Suits
projects.description:
Finally, these cyber suits are charged up and ready for action! 

- 8 skins!
- Pick the design that suits you best!

projects.title: Mob Holiday
projects.description:
Winter has finally come! The holidays are always a great time of the year. Spend the winter break doing what you do best with some of your favorite mobs! 

- Includes 10 unique skins.
- Sweaters, Scarves, and more.
- Comfy and perfect for you!

projects.title: Demon Squads!
projects.description:
These demons are from different Nether factions. Fighting for their biomes, these scary squads will do whatever it takes to keep the laws of the Nether in a balance. Watch out for their monster horns, they're sharp!

These squads fight for 4 different territories:

- Crimson Forest
- Nether Wastes
- Soulsand Valley
- Warped Forest

Which Nether biome suits you?

projects.title: Omega City
projects.description:
An emergency alarm has been sounded in the financial center! The businessmen of this futuristic city have run for shelter as the streets fill with monsters!
- Extensive action-packed urban experience
- Highly detailed building interiors to explore
- Fight challenging enemies and earn rewarding loot
- Ask your friends for help! Multiplayer ready map!

projects.title: Skyland Desert Skulls
projects.description:
Use an intricate teleport system & fight your way through Skyland! Adventurers beware, some islands might be more dangerous than others. Choose wisely!

+ Travel to different unique floating islands with an advanced teleport system.
+ Loot galore! Exploring will be worth your time.
+ Different difficulty on every island!

projects.title: 8-bit Minis
projects.description:
Right out of a classic console, enjoy a touch of retro with those minimalistic skins. Half the pixels, double the fun!

- Retro 8 bit pack
- Cute skins that will brighten your day!
- Super colorful modern outfits
- by Razzleberries

projects.title: Animal Business
projects.description:
These animals are cute but professional! That's why they're wearing suits! Can't you tell?
- Furry, fluffy and small animals, all here to help you.
-Professional dogs, fish, birds and bunnies - you'll look unique with these skins.
- Fancy, smart and stylish.
- By Razzleberries

projects.title: Evil Overlord Simulator
projects.description:
Welcome to your kingdom, Overlord. Will you rule with mercy or with an iron fist?
Use your powers to collect taxes, send villagers to the dungeon and control guards.
Or choose to lead a simpler life as a knight or villager instead!
Multiplayer ready!

- Start with royal body guards who will fight for you!
- NPC dialogue changes depending on your role within the kingdom!

projects.title: Flower Valley
projects.description:
A large valley to explore with friends! Many houses to explore.

- Custom terrain with many houses!
- Many role-playing areas!
- Mountains and houses to explore!

projects.title: Mobs Black & White!
projects.description:
The mobs have lost all their color!
Pick up this pack featuring super unique black and white mobs!

+ 12 skins with 2 that are FREE!
+ Includes monochrome skins!

projects.title: Cliffside Mansions
projects.description:
Will you claim a house that takes 100 seconds, a villa that takes 100 minutes, or perhaps the residence that takes 100 hours?!
Role-play who will be the master of a majestic residence accompanied by supercars!

- 3 custom supercars!
- Great for single player or multiplayer!
- Great for role-playing!

projects.title: Millionaire Vacation Island
projects.description:
Live in style and luxury on this vacation island! Make yourselves at home as a millionaire and have fun in this majestic haven!

-Fully furnished $100,000,000 island!
-Drivable helicopter, car, speedboat & jet ski!
-Multiplayer-friendly

projects.title: Diamond Tycoon
projects.description:
UPDATED - Now with awesome new features! Become a miner and reach for the diamonds! Upgrade your compressor, drill and storage space and maximize your diamond production!

+ NEW - New upgrades!
+ NEW - Added repair system!
+ Hidden Diamonds!
+ Purchasable upgrades!
+ And more!

projects.title: Backrooms Entities
projects.description:
Backrooms Entities have been documented roaming the endless eerie mazes of The Backrooms!
Chase and terrify your friends through The Backrooms as a uniquely horrifying entity! 

+ 12 Backrooms Entities skins!
+ 1 free skin!
+ Includes unsettling Backrooms Entities!

projects.title: The Lost Labyrinths II
projects.description:
These 25 machiavellian labyrinths could become your tomb. Only those with exceptional navigation skills will be able to free themselves from their convoluted walls. Are you one of them?
-Increasing difficulty and boss levels
-Unique environments: a flooded city, animal dominions, space invasions and more
-Skip up to 5 levels without forfeiting your victory!

projects.title: Extreme Survival: Acid Island
projects.description:
The floor is Acid! Careful if you want to take a dip in the waters of this world, it will burn you! Explore this dangerous landscape and connect the multiple islands together to discover the amazing caves and dungeons it hides!

- Acidic ocean!
- Multiple explorable islands!
- Multiple hidden treasure chests with loot!
- Hidden dungeons and caves!
- And more!

projects.title: Monster Highschool
projects.description:
Welcome to the world's wickedest academy! Learn dark arts and meet your new monster friends. But don't wreak havoc, Principal Slender is never happy to see you!

- Huge building! Lots of available roleplay settings
- 20 monster NPCs: vampires, evil puppets, werewolves, aliens, ghosts...
- Have fun acting out your own story
- Win a Zombie Ball match

projects.title: Simple Spawns: Winter Castle
projects.description:
Bunker up from the snowy sky in a cozy winter castle, in the latest installment of Simple Spawns! Become a king or queen and rule over the winter landscape, command your villagers, and grow your kingdom!

- Explore the castle and collect loot chests!
- Perfect for Christmas or any winter holiday!
- Multiplayer-friendly Minecraft Survival Spawn!

projects.title: Forgotten Village
projects.description:
Forgotten Village is ready for challengers! Are you brave enough to defeat the Illagers, zombies, and evil mobs that have taken over this once peaceful town? Here is how:
+ START your journey with a pet WOLF!
+ FIND the Skeleton Horse and all the Wither skulls!
+ RESCUE the Villagers from PRISON.
+ DESTROY the Illager base with TNT!
+ ROLEPLAY as 2 HD cute adventurer skins

projects.title: Giant Billionaire Mansion
projects.description:
A billionaire on vacations! Explore an insane modern mansion and find incredible equipment!

Here begins your new adventure!

-A giant mansion to explore! 
-Tons of crazy rooms!
-Find secrets and hidden chests!

projects.title: Creepy Clowns
projects.description:
The Creepy Clowns are on the loose all over Minecraft this Halloween!
Will you cause laughter, screams or both? You decide with this pack of colorful but terrifying clowns!

+ 10 HD skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes creepy clown skins!

projects.title: Welcome to the Beach
projects.description:
People love to spend their holidays at the beach. This is your opportunity to enjoy the summer life you are seeking. Where will you go first?

-Real oceanfront experience: docked boats, attractions, resorts and much more
-Explore the world, find secret loot and kickstart your adventure
-Ride the waves with an exclusive 3D modeled motorboat!

projects.title: The Floor is Lava
projects.description:
The classic childhood game recreated in a fully-fledged digital environment. Try to get home safely, but check your footing, because The Floor is Lava!

-5 long levels: school, traffic jam, subway, suburbs and home
-Parkour over everyday objects and street furniture
-3 game modes: normal, collectathon and time trial
-Multiplayer ready: challenge your friends to a run!

projects.title: MC Vs Real Life
projects.description:
Have you ever wondered what MC skins would look like in real life?
With this pack see your favorite characters in a classic style as well as realistic creations!

+ 12 HD Skins
+ 1 free HD skin
+ Includes zombie, skeleton and villager skins!

projects.title: Pizza Party!
projects.description:
Throw a delicious pizza party and invite your friends!
Roleplay as the pizza chef, a delivery person, even an actual pepperoni pizza, and more!

+ 14 skins!
+ 2 free skins!
+ Includes derpy pizza skins!

projects.title: Modern Cliffside Base
projects.description:
Treat yourself to the majestic ocean view from your modern home! Breathe in the fresh air to ready yourself with energy right before your epic adventure!

-Fantastic ocean view!
-Modern peaceful home!
-Huge explorable to explore!
-And much more!

projects.title: Advanced Hideout: Mountain
projects.description:
Welcome to Minecraft's most advanced hiding place! It's creeper proof, phantom proof, and beautiful too! Hidden from view, you can parkour around your base and find the surprises it has to offer!

-5 unique rooms!
-A fun roleplaying experience!
-Fancy decorations!
-Redstone surprises hidden about!

projects.title: Japanese Spirits
projects.description:
Get transported away to the Japanese spirit world where yokai roam the land!
Become a mythical spirit and surprise, spook and play with your friends!

+ 12 Japanese Spirit skins!
+ Includes a free skin!
+ Includes kitsune, tengu and even ghost sandal skins!

projects.title: Secret Bookshelf Base
projects.description:
Some books lead to fairytales, others lead to a secret base! In this map you go on an adventure in a base behind a book shelf and find rare treasures and have fun discovering new areas in the base!

+ Explorable hidden base!
+ Various activities!
+ Multiple hidden treasure chests with loot!
+ Hidden dungeons and caves!
+ And more!

projects.title: Black White Demons
projects.description:
Dive into the "Black White Demons" skin pack, where cool meets otherworldly! Express your unique style with sleek, edgy designs. Grab your pack, and let the demon transformation bring some cool vibes to your Minecraft gaming.

- 10 demon teens skins.
- Bring a fresh look to your survival or roleplay experience.

projects.title: Extreme Survival Giant Planets
projects.description:
Waking up in outer space to find yourself surrounded by giant planets and meteorites! Explore each individual planet, each with its own surprises and environments! Better gather your resources and equipment before you take off on your adventure!

+ Hidden treasure!
+ Multiple explorable planets!
+ Hidden dungeons and caves!
+ And more!

projects.title: Hidden Underground Base
projects.description:
Pull the trigger and the door will open wide for you! Live in a luxurious hidden base accompanied with your dream cars!

- Massive underground base!
- Hide from your friends in a secret hideaway!
- Secret entrance!
- Secret garage door!

projects.title: Pixels
projects.description:
Zoom in and set a trend with this 8-bit inspired Pixels set! The skin set that pops straight out of the screen!

- 8 pixel art skins
- Unique retro designs!

projects.title: PvP Training Zone
projects.description:
Having trouble beating your opponents in PvP games? Hone your skills in this training-oriented arena designed by a renowned PvPer!
- Multiplayer only - up to 4 players.
- Learn to traverse terrain in 12 custom arenas.
- Select a kit and improve your potion PvP, UHC, or vanilla PvP skills.
- Practice aiming, strafing, inventory management, and more!
